job_name: Marketing & Operations Specialist_Singapore
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Please Apply Here】https://grnh.se/0b9266a41us

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to new markets as well. 

Facing the quick changing field of social media, we hope to find more talent to join Dcard. We need a Marketing & Operations Specialist_Singapore to join us and spearhead the expansion of new market marketing and operations, work cross culturally and ensure success in our new ambitions. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Our New Market Team】
Thousands of people share their stories on Dcard everyday. The New Market team is a part of the Overseas Team, working alongside our Hong Kong and Japan teams. You will work with Market Research, Advertising and Product Management teams to share our product on the global stage. 

【What You’ll Do】
* Formulate and execute marketing strategies for the Singapore market, including online, physical marketing campaigns and other marketing channels to acquire users
* Propose long-term social media development strategies, maintain daily operations, and facilitate cooperation opportunities with cross-industry brands/KOLs to enhance brand value
* Collect information on product development, business strategy, and competitor analysis to propose Singapore market optimization 
* Gain insight through user feedback and observation of user behavior for the optimization of the Singapore market and products 
* Other miscellaneous tasks related to marketing and new market operations

【Requirements】
* At least 2 years of marketing related experience 
* Ability to communicate cross culturally 
    * Business level Chinese
    * Business level English 
* Great interpersonal skills
* Detail-oriented, proactive and willing to learn and adapt 
* Possess project management capabilities, able to plan and arrange schedules and integrate resources
* Familiar with social media services, highly sensitive to current events, media and internet trends and able to drive discussion based on observations
* Ability to use editing software (Illustrator, Photoshop)

【Even Better If】
* Dcard/Dtto user
* Experience working at a fast paced startup 
* Experience working cross culturally 
* Able to use marketing tools: GA, SEO 

【Why Join Us?】
* Passionate multicultural team with a growth mindset 
* Take part in social, e-commerce, advertising and new market products
* Frequent, transparent communication 
* Books, classes, conferences provided for continuous learning 
* Flexible work hours and a flexible environment 
* Online and offline celebrations with a great team 

【Location】
* Dcard Taipei Headquarters 

【Salary】
* Negotiable

【Notice】
* If we think there is an opportunity for collaboration we will contact you as soon as possible!
* Unsuitable candidates may not receive further notice.

At Dcard, every member is equal, and we value and celebrate differences. We strive to provide a diverse and inclusive environment, giving respect to every member. We believe that equality and diversity can bring infinite possibilities for innovation. Dcard maintains a non-discriminatory employment environment, giving equal opportunity to all candidates.

job_name: Data Analyst - Overseas
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. We continue to make impactful influence in the social media, advertising and e-commerce fields. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market.

As a Data Analyst at Dcard, your decisions and strategies will impact users all over the world and bring beautiful experiences to their lives. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【Why should you join Dcard?】

Dcard provides different services and products such as Draw Card, Forums, E-Commerce and our users range from college students to working adults. Our growth mindset allows us to continue building our fast-developing organization and continue to extend its influence. Working as an analyst at Dcard will allow you to work with millions of user behavior data across social media, e-commerce and international markets, giving you the opportunity to hone in your skills. We provide a platform with potential, and we want you to join us in creating an experience that connects the world!

【About the Product Team】

As part of the product team, you will work closely with the Product Manager, Overseas Team and Operations Team. You’ll work within a culture that is data driven, exploring large amounts of data to better understand the needs of our users. You’ll also provide critical business insights that directly influence the decisions of our overseas markets, becoming a key member in the development of them. With your help, we hope to continue optimizing our products and provide an even better user experience.

【What You’ll Do】

．Analyze results through various user acquisition channels (Platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads and Facebook Groups) and assist in optimizing marketing budgets
．Assist Dcard in data analysis of online and offline marketing events in the overseas markets, providing insights to continue campaign design optimization
．Collect, analyze and integrate data from all parties, creating dashboard reports or data tools to improve decision making quality
．Outline user profile through user behavior data to assist the product development and overseas operations teams in better understanding our users
．Formulate appropriate indicators for A/B Tests, analyze and use experiment results as the basis for formulation of product strategies
．Collaborate with the product development and overseas operations teams in reaching product targets

【What We’re Looking For】

．Minimum 1 year experience in analysis of digital products
．Understand digital marketing trends and be able to to pick up various analysis tools quickly
．Familiar with SQL syntax and experience in querying data from relational databases
．Familiar with Data Studio or other visualization tools and able to integrate and use various data sets independently
．Excellent communication skills
．Good at observing user behavior and possesses a good product sense

【Bonus Points If You Have】

．Experience as a Data Analyst or experience performing product analysis on any team - APP preferable
．Experience working in a start-up or tech company with ability to adapt to a fast paced environment and cross department collaboration
．Experience related to multinational products
．Data driven mindset with a passion for experiments, familiarity with A/B testing
．Familiarity with analysis tools and platforms such as Amplitude and AppsFlyer

job_name: Sales Manager
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方式】
請至：https://grnh.se/pc8jd61投遞履歷， 我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 *Sales Manager* 加入我們，協助品牌客戶更有效、更有趣地與年輕人互動，建立品牌與 Dcard 用戶間的橋樑，期待熟悉廣告媒體生態且擁有業務特質的你，加入這個熱愛挑戰的團隊，一起打造被千萬人喜愛與使用的產品！

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】
Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。每天都有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你將有機會提供客戶接觸到龐大的使用者，為客戶提供更多的價值與服務。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的廣告團隊】
廣告團隊是 Dcard 面向品牌方提供廣告與行銷企劃的專業團隊，幫助品牌客戶在 Dcard 上取得更好的品牌曝光、產品宣傳等推廣效果。你將和 Campaign Planner 及廣告專員們共同合作，深入了解品牌客戶的廣告需求，並進行廣告企劃提案，幫助品牌方建立與 Dcard 使用者的橋樑，為品牌客戶提供更好的廣告成效，達成 Dcard 與客戶及用戶的三贏機會。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】
• 多元整合行銷方案的提案、規劃與執行
• 開發廣告客戶，維繫既有客戶關係，達成公司業績目標
• 理解與溝通客戶需求，協助客戶規劃媒體行銷組合

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Sales Manager 具備以下能力】
• 3年以上數位廣告業務經驗
• 良好簡報提案能力及溝通技巧
• 熟悉廣告媒體產業生態
• 跨部門溝通協調能力

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】
• 熟悉精品、烈酒、服飾、金融、FMCG、零售、汽車產業者佳
• 熱愛廣告與客戶開發，能持續發掘中小企業的數位廣告需求

【注意事項】
• 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡您！
• 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。
• 重複投遞履歷，不會加快您的履歷處理速度。

job_name: Group Product Manager
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Application】Please submit your resume via https://grnh.se/bfa227af1us, resumes submitted via this link will be reviewed primarily.

We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. We continue to make impactful influence in the social media, advertising and e-commerce fields. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market.

As a Group Product Manager at Dcard, you'll be a member of our product team and drive our business forward, and work closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Dcard Product Team】

You will collaborate closely with product team to shape product strategies across different teams, decomposing them and giving teams dedicated remits in different aspects. In Dcard’s Product Team, you will face challenges on how to deliver product fulfilling users needs, interact with various stakeholders, and create user-centric experiences with millions of users and the next evolutionary step for Dcard.


【What you'll do】

．Drive and motivate product managers to build effective long-term product strategies that is align with company mission and vision.
．Lead and manage product team form product ideas into concept, and all the way to product launch.
．Work with stakeholders across the company to prioritize and deliver on multi-team roadmaps.
．Coach and mentor Product Managers by growing their capabilities, and creating the environment for the team to be successful. 

【What We’re Looking For】

．2+ years of product team management experience, and have led two or more teams.
．5+ years of experience in large scale global product management.
．Familiar with various methods and tools for product management, verification, and building MVPs, preferably with product go-to-market experience.
．Strong business acumen and proficient analytical skills. Can disassemble the problem that you observe and infer the sources behind the problem with logic.
．Excellent communication skills and know-how to coordinate and cooperate with different roles in the company.
．Believe in Human-Centered Design. Not only care about what we do but also care more about the reasons for what we do.

【Bonus Points If You Have】

．Proficient verbal and written skills in both English and Chinese.
．Be interested in startups, social networks, and technology products. 
．Take Tech News as a part of daily life.

【Why you should join us?】

．We are an enthusiastic team at scale with a growth mindset and we are building up a fast-developing organization.
．We develop interesting products in multiple fields and different markets(e.g social media, advertising, e-commerce...stc), taking part in the creation of various new ideas, new products, or even new markets!
．We have a company culture of high-frequent communication and actively discuss and  give feedback to each other.
．Any learning resources like books, lectures, or international conferences, can be accessed at any time since the spirit of Dcard is to keep learning.
．Our working atmosphere is flexible, which means you can adjust your work flexibly whether you are an engineer, designer or in other roles.
．We treasure every moment when we’re together. We hold parties and various sessions for everyone connect in our team.

【Compensation】

．Negotiable

job_detail:
領先業界42年的「空中美語教育集團」 AMC Group 招募頂尖銷售菁英
給您一展長才的舞台，歡迎想要快速累積財富的您!

【保障高底薪再加高額業績獎金】
1.利用網路雲端平台及電話來介紹與銷售公司課程(電話行銷)
2.提供客戶專業的英語課程規劃與諮詢，幫助客戶完成英文夢想
3.公司提供豐沛優質現有客戶名單，不須陌生開發
4.完整職前訓練，用專業培育國際銷售及管理人才
5.提供企業各部門職缺優先輪調機會，拓展國際視野
6.保障底薪及新人津貼，並依績效隨時調昇，有同業業務經驗一年以上者，可提供更高額底薪！
7.優於同業的高業績獎金，年輕就能實現百萬年薪
8.短時間內能累積大量與客戶應對經驗，對於想深耕業務領域的您不容錯過！
9.明確與透明之升遷制度。

工作地點：古亭捷運站出口旁

【員工福利】
成為AMC Group的正職夥伴 - 
1.進修補助、生日禮金、績效獎金、育兒津貼、就學津貼、結婚禮金、生產慰問金、住院補助、癌症補助
2.五星級美食/名牌精品獎勵(iPad Air、LV、Tiffany、Mont Blanc、Gucci、Burberry)
3.透明暢通的績效表現升遷制度 (業績達到標準，保障底薪立即調昇!)
4.周休二日
5.勞保、健保、團保、勞退基金完全保障 
6.員工推薦親友優惠及獎金方案
7.以及一群有難同當，有福同享的夥伴！
8.對於想短時間累積大量客戶經驗的你，不容錯過！
	

AMC Group空中美語集團投入國內語言教育已超過38年，擁有百位頂尖跨國際教學研發團隊，42年來，不論在語言教材研發，數位叢書，互動影音訓練，及雲端多媒體運算的設計研究皆有卓越成就，並屢次獲獎項肯定。
目前共7個主要研發部門，包含 ❶ 雜誌編輯部 ❷ 數位叢書部 ❸ 影音教學部 ❹ 空中美語空中家教事業部 ❺ 網路多媒體製作部 ❻ 兒童美語教學研發部 ❼ 聽力測驗中心

42年累積下來的龐大教學資源，我們致力發展雲端教學系統空中美語空中家教，雲端整合AMC集團全球教學資源，將國內語言學習服務推向更高境界，讓學習者透過雲端平台，隨時、隨地可享受優質的語言學習服務。

job_name: Social Media Intern_Dtto Peru
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Please Apply Through the Link Below】
https://grnh.se/04305b561us 

【About us】

Dcard is the biggest anonymous community in Taiwan. With millions of active users and 18 million unique visitors per month, Dcard provides a free and secure environment for our users to share their thoughts, stories, and life experience and make the world a better place through the exchange of ideas.

As we are currently expanding our business in international markets, we are looking for a Social Media Intern who is passionate and talented to join us, and build the next big thing for the generation together. As a Social Media Intern at Dtto (the name Dcard uses for international markets), you will be a member of our New Market Team and drive our business forward, as you'll help us to catch the eyes of Latinos with appealing digital content and drive the user acquisition of Dtto in Latin America. Let’s build a community to help university students in Peru expand their social circle!

【Get to know New Market Team】

There are thousands of people who share and read stories from different members on Dcard every day, so the ideas you develop and implement will immediately reach a great number of users. You will collaborate with several functional teams such as Marketing, Product, Design, and Developer to identify opportunities, create strategies and execute global expansion plans. As a member of the New Market Team, you will focus on a variety of areas and aspects related to the emerging markets to provide users with the best user experience.

【What you'll do】

* Manage Dtto social media accounts (Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok etc.), design the posting content and plan/ execute creative social media marketing campaigns
* Collect successful digital marketing cases in Peru
* Collect a list of potential partners for promotions
* Contribute brilliant marketing ideas to the New Market Team

【Qualifications】

* Language
    * Native level Spanish
    * Conversational level English
* Understanding of social media behaviors of Peruvian users
* Passionate and active in social media
* Able to work for 20 hours per week

【Bonus qualifications】 

* Conversational level Chinese
* Lived in Peru for more than 2 years
* Graduated from a Peruvian university
* Graphic/multimedia design and editing skills
* Video shooting and editing skills
* Previous experience in the digital marketing field
* Previous experience working for a fast-paced tech startup

【Location of work】

* Work at Peru / Taipei / remotely 

【Salary】

* In Taipei : 200 NTD / hour
* In Peru : 1025 PEN / month

【About us】

Dcard is the biggest anonymous community in Taiwan. With millions of active users and 18 million unique visitors per month, Dcard provides a free and secure environment for our users to share their thoughts, stories, and life experience and make the world a better place through the exchange of ideas.

As we are currently expanding our business in international markets, we are looking for a Marketing Specialist who is passionate and talented to join us, and build the next big thing for the generation together. As a Marketing Specialist at Dtto (the name Dcard uses for international markets), you will be a member of our New Market Team and drive our business forward, as you'll help us to catch the eyes of Latinos with appealing digital content and drive the user acquisition of Dtto in Latin America. Let’s build a community to help university students in Latin America expand their social circle!

【Get to know New Market Team】

There are thousands of people who share and read stories from different members on Dcard every day, so the ideas you develop and implement will immediately reach a great number of users. You will collaborate with several functional teams such as Advertising, Product and Market Research to identify opportunities, create strategies and execute global expansion plans. job_name: Senior QA Specialist
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方式】請至：https://grnh.se/42f687ce1us 投遞履歷， 我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 Senior QA Specialist 加入我們，幫助我們提升產品的穩定性，讓交付到使用者手上的產品能提供最佳使用者體驗

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】
Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的產品團隊】
你將產品經理、設計師、工程師一同合作，理解使用者，將使用者的操作情境轉化為測試計劃，並為開發團隊建立測試流程，為 Dcard 上數百萬使用者加強產品的穩定性，創造更豐富的社群經驗！


【你的工作目標】
理解使用者，將使用者的操作情境轉化為測試計畫，為 Dcard 上數百萬使用者加強產品的穩定性，創造更豐富的社群經驗！

* 針對 web/app 的每次版本更新建立標準測試流程。
* 針對各項功能制定測試計畫書及測試案例。
* 建立並執行複雜的功能測試。
* 記錄測試期間的問題，對 bug 追蹤並做優先級排序
* 分析測試資料、釐清問題並提出改善建議。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Senior QA Specialist 具備以下能力】
* 至少 3 年以上的 QA 經驗。
* 有 web 跟 app 的測試經驗，能夠在品質和速度間取得良好平衡。
* 豐富的測試經驗，對軟體開發流程熟悉。
* 對於流程最佳化有熱情，能夠在每次相似的任務中持續進步
* 在思考問題或闡述想法時，腦中會有清楚的脈絡和邏輯推演。

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了】
* 熟悉自動化流程在 API/UI/效能 的各項應用。
* 曾經從零到一幫助團隊建立測試流程。
* 有從零到一建立測試平台的經驗。
* Dcard 的重度用戶，熟悉產品功能與論壇內容
* 對 APP/Web 開發流程有興趣，迫不及待想看到業界專案規劃
* 勇於接受挑戰、持續突破，相信事情永遠都能做得更好
* 勇於踏出舒適圈，樂於了解過去不熟悉的知識

【薪資範圍】
* 面議

【注意事項】
* 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡您！
* 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。
* 重複投遞履歷，不會加快您的履歷處理速度喔！

job_name: Data Engineer, Social Product
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞辦法】請至：https://grnh.se/43c314071us 投遞履歷， 我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard 來打造更好的產品。無論是文章的推薦系統、廣告系統、搜尋系統背後都需要一個強而有力的 Data Infrastructure 來作為 Data driven 產品的後盾，我們期待這個角色可以建構一套穩定有效率的 Data Pipeline，設計易用高效的 Data warehouse / mart，發揮極大的影響力讓產品團隊能更容易的開發出令使用者滿意的服務。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】

Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。每天都有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你將有機會提供客戶接觸到龐大的使用者，為客戶提供更多的價值與服務。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的工程團隊】

身為 Dcard 工程團隊的一員，除了功能面開發，你也會專注優化開發者體驗與架構，並評估導入新的技術。在 Dcard 你將會面臨許多有趣挑戰，著手開發流量大的產品，不斷調整並改善現有的架構，提供順暢的服務給千萬使用者。

1. Data Driven - 團隊內任何的分析與決策都是圍繞著重要指標運作，擬定產品開發目標時也都是依據 OKR 的設定來衡量是否有價值，藉此確保夥伴們都在同個軌道並朝著相同目標前進。比起仰賴感覺來判斷，我們更重視依靠數據來思考。
2. 快速前進 - 能夠跟一群很厲害的人一起工作，不論在技術或合作能力都會有顯著成長。且團隊步調很快，我們期待產品能夠快速前進，相對的每天也會遇到許多挑戰，像是如何把廣告系統架起來承受高流量，或是如何維持資料更新即時又快速等。
3. 流程優化 - 團隊很在意流程是否順暢，持續思考如何合作會更有效率。我們會捲起袖子，直接去改變困擾我們的事物，優化整個開發跟生活的體驗。
4. 持續成長 - 除了例行性的讀書會，我們會透過團隊內的 Developer Session ，了解不同 domain 的夥伴做過哪些專案；也會邀請團隊外部成員向我們分享其他團隊成功案例或開發過程。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】
．參與 Dcard 資料相關產品的開發以及優化，可能會碰觸到的東西有商業數據報表開發，OLAP 系統開發，Data Pipeline 設計，以及 Data Infrastructure 有關的專案。
．研究、引進最新 Data Infrastructure 的技術。
．和其他專案的開發者合作開發 Dcard 資料相關系統建置。
．快速交付可行性架構跟改進資料產品相關計畫。
．跟產品團隊、業務團隊、分析師合作參與 Dcard 商業報表平台的開發與優化。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Data Engineer 具備以下能力】
．熟悉 python 且不排斥學習新語言（Go, Scala）。
．能夠寫出可讀性高、可維護、可延伸性的程式以及進行高品質的 code review。
．熟悉軟體專案開發流程。
．可以根據定義好的問題設計技術解決方案。
．有良好的溝通協作能力，能夠清楚的表達想法，並與其他團隊順利合作。
．有維護開發 ETL 的經驗
．有維護開發 API server 的經驗，熟悉 python web framework ex: Flask, FastAPI
．熟悉其中一種 database 並了解其特性並能選擇適合的運用場景 ex: PostgreSQL, MongoDB

【如果你擁有以下能力、經驗與特質，那就更棒了！】
．熟悉分散式系統設計，處理巨量資料或大型系統開發。
．熟悉 streaming 的開發流程
．有在 K8s 上部署專案並維護的經驗
．對 CI/CD 流程有基礎的認知並使用過 CI/CD management 工具 ex: circle CI
．有建制過 monitor and alert system 並維護的經驗 ex: Grafana, Prometheus

job_name: Backend Developer
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Application】Please submit your resume via https://grnh.se/07c3ecbe1us  , resumes submitted via this link will be reviewed primarily.

We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. We continue to make impactful influence in the social media, advertising and e-commerce fields. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market. 

As a Backend Developer at Dcard, you will collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter and create tools that accelerate growth. Join our team of developers to build the social network of the next generation. We code in a fresh monolithic repository and ship code every few hours, and most importantly, we're never afraid of using new and bold approaches to conquer challenges.

If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Our Backend Team】

As a Backend Developer at Dcard, you will collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter and create tools that accelerate growth. Join our team to build the social network of the next generation. We use various tools to continuously deliver new ideas and implementations into production, and most importantly, we're enthusiastic about using new and bold approaches to conquer challenges.

Tech Stack

．Mainly use Go and Node.js.
．Applying microservices architecture with Kubernetes on GCP.
．Using various databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ScyllaDB, Redis, etc., according to different requirements.
．Go service architecture is mainly based on Go Kit architecture, with in-house developed codegen tools and gRPC as the main communication framework.
．Using CircleCI for CI/CD, system testing and deployment more secure and stable.

About Our Team

．20+ backend developers.
．Weekly meetings to discuss issues, tech stack & tools.
．Bi-weekly study group to learn new tech stack.
．Monthly engineering seminar.
．Regular system design review.

【What You'll Do】

．Fully understand the features and framework of our product.
．Handle high traffic issues and provide a smooth and stable user experience, including infrastructure & database setup and optimization, cache mechanism, data migration, etc
．Explore and introduce new tech stack(s) in line with our needs, and leave ample time for developers to conduct evaluations.
．Implement and optimize shared libraries and development tools.
．Develop readable and maintainable code in line with requirements.
．Participate in various learning discussions within the group, such as weekly meetings, study groups and design review meetings, etc.

【What We're Looking For】

．1+ years of experience in backend development
．Familiar with Golang or Node.js
．Have experience in using Git-related moderation tools 
．Experience using any database (PostgreSQL/MySQL/MariaDB)
．Willingness to learn and use new tech stack
．Strong basic knowledge of computer science

【Bonus Points If You Have】

．Experience in DevOps
．Experience in using GCP, AWS, Azure
．Familiar with NoSQL database
．Familiar with CI/CD

【Compensation】

．NTD 800,000 ~ 1,150,000 / year

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】

Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【簡單介紹 Customer Service 團隊】

客服團隊是使用者與 Dcard 間的橋樑，除了協助使用者排除問題外，也是維護 Dcard 社群生態的重要角色，我們會和產品、營運、公關與法務團隊協作，持續優化使用者體驗，讓每個人都能在 Dcard 自在地和其他卡友分享生活大小事！


【你將在團隊參與⋯】

．制定客服團隊目標與執行方案
．優化 Dcard 用戶之客服體驗、建立團隊 SOP 與重要案例判斷
．整合用戶回饋，協助產品開發團隊改善與優化 Dcard
．跨團隊溝通，包含與公關、法務、營運等部門協作，打造友善的社群生態
．團隊招募與長期教育訓練


【我們期待看到一個優秀的客服經理具備以下能力】

．至少五年以上的網路客服相關團隊經驗
．曾管理三人以上的團隊，擔任管理職至少兩年以上
．關注各種社群媒體，最好有使用 Dcard 的習慣
．抗壓性強、樂觀、有良好的溝通與邏輯組織能力
．具數據思維且樂於學習成長，能在使用者質化量化回饋中找出團隊的優化方向

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】

．與國外團隊溝通合作之經驗，能以英/日文溝通

【為什麼要加入我們？】

．充滿熱情的跨國團隊，用成長型思維打造快速成長的組織。
．打造社群、電商、廣告、跨國市場等挑戰性產品，參與各類新想法、新產品甚至是新市場的誕生！
．擁有高頻率的溝通文化，夥伴頻繁地討論合作並給予回饋。
．隨時取得書籍、課程講座、國內外 Conference 等任何資源，持續學習就是 Dcard 團隊的核心精神。
．彈性的工作氛圍，不論你是工程師、營運、設計等任何角色，你將擁有彈性工時安排的空間。
．重視每個相聚的時刻 ，不論是線上或線下，舉辦節慶派對各式分享會，讓大家在團隊生活得更開心。

job_name: Machine Learning Engineer (Ads)
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方法】：請至  https://grnh.se/f8eb10ef1us 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 致力於打造一個讓每個人透過分享以及社群互動，可以在這個平台上找到共鳴的地方。為了達成這個目標，我們的工程師利用統計與機器學習方法，分析使用者產生的內容與閱讀偏好、設計演算法、打造各種應用，讓每個人每次打開 Dcard 的時候都能立刻發現有趣的故事。

這個職位主要會協助我們做廣告系統的建置以及資料的規劃，我們希望可以優化使用者在 Dcard 站上的廣告體驗以及建構資料分析和廣告投放所需要的相關系統建置。未來比較熟悉之後再進一步與 Dcard 其他資料相關的應用系統做整合與架構建置。

在 Dcard 你將有機會可以接觸到⼤量⽤戶產生的實際資料。我們每⽉有超過一千五百萬不重複訪客，每天有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你所製作的產品將能立刻接觸到龐大的使用者，成為改善使用者體驗的關鍵，在他們的生活中創造一個美好的驚喜。

我們希望可以打造未來台灣人在網路上討論的基礎生活設施，因此在這份工作裡面自然而然就會遇到很多像是 Facebook, Twitter, Line 遇到的技術挑戰。聽起來是不是很吸引人呢？如果你對機器學習產品抱持憧憬跟熱情，不要猶豫了，趕快來跟我們一起工作！

【短期主要負責內容】
· 參與 Dcard 廣告系統算法端的開發
· 快速交付可行性架構跟改進廣告產品系統相關計畫。
· 協助設計師、前端與後端⼯程師進行介⾯或使用流程的 A/B 測試。

【長期可能碰觸到的內容】
· 參與 Dcard 機器學習相關產品的開發以及優化，可能會碰觸到的東西有 data pipeline 設計以及 machine learning product operation 及演算法開發。
· 和其他 data component 的開發者合作開發 Dcard 機器學習相關系統建置。

【必要條件】
· 有一年以上的推薦系統或廣告系統工作經驗，熟悉相關應用場景。
· 熱愛思考使⽤者的需求，將演算法動手打造成產品。
· 熟悉 python 且不排斥學習新語言（Go, Scala）。
· 喜歡追求高品質的程式，面對需求能夠提出最小可行性系統架構及了解其中的 tradeoff。
· 有良好的溝通協作能力，能夠清楚的表達想法，並與其他團隊順利合作。
· 對機器學習演算法及工作流程有基礎的認知，例如 Factorization Machine / Recommendation System 等等。

【加分條件】
· 熟悉分散式系統設計，處理巨量資料或大型系統開發。
· 熟悉機器學習系統商業應用場景 + 系統設計。
· 能夠解決 Keras / PyTorch 在巨量資料開發時遇到的問題。

【可能碰觸到的技術】
· Airflow
· Kubernetes
· Postgres / BigQuery / Redis
· Scikit-Learn / XGBoost / PyTorch
· Linux

job_name: Social Media Intern (Visual materials creation skill required)
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Please Apply Through the Link Below】
https://grnh.se/2805de101us

【About us】

Dcard is the biggest anonymous community in Taiwan. With millions of active users and 18 million unique visitors per month, Dcard provides a free and secure environment for our users to share their thoughts, stories, and life experience and make the world a better place through the exchange of ideas.

As we are currently expanding our business in international markets, we are looking for a Social Media Intern who is passionate and talented to join us, and build the next big thing for the generation together. As a Social Media Intern at Dtto (the name Dcard uses for international markets), you will be a member of our New Market Team and drive our business forward, as you'll help us to catch the eyes of Latinos with appealing digital content and drive the user acquisition of Dtto in Latin America. Let’s build a community to help university students in Peru expand their social circle!

【Get to know New Market Team】

There are thousands of people who share and read stories from different members on Dcard every day, so the ideas you develop and implement will immediately reach a great number of users. You will collaborate with several functional teams such as Marketing, Product, Design, and Developer to identify opportunities, create strategies and execute global expansion plans. As a member of the New Market Team, you will focus on a variety of areas and aspects related to the emerging markets to provide users with the best user experience.

【What you'll do】

* Design the visual materials for the New Market team, such as social media posts, advertisement materials...etc
* Create innovative social media posting templates
* Collaborate with members from the marketing team and provide perspectives/suggestions for visual design

【Qualifications】

* Language
    * Native level Spanish
    * Conversational level English
* Familiar with the usage of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator or other design software
* Able to film/edit short videos
* Understanding of the preferred design/style of the Peruvian youth generation
* Able to work for at least 20 hours per week

【Bonus qualifications】 

* Conversational level Chinese
* Lived in Peru for more than 2 years
* Graduated from a Peruvian university
* Previous experience working for a fast-paced tech startup

【Location of work】

* Work at Peru / Taipei / remotely 

【Salary】

* In Taipei : 200 NTD / hour
* In Peru : 1025 PEN / month

【Assignment】

* Please share your design portfolio with us (optional)

job_name: Senior Frontend Engineer
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Application】Please submit your resume via https://grnh.se/nhevqk1 , resumes submitted via this link will be reviewed primarily

We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform service devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the youth generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month, making a substantial influence and achieving high penetration amongst the youth in Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. across the globe. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding our scale to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market. 

As a Senior Frontend Developer at Dcard, you will collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter and create tools that accelerate growth. Join our team of talented developers to build the social network of the next generation. We code in a fresh monolithic repository and ship code every few hours, and most importantly, we‘re never afraid of trying new and bold approaches to conquer challenges.

If you are ready to spark in your career, join us in creating the experience that connects people all around the world!

【In this role, you will】
．Design and develop compelling and performant web applications that deliver diverse content worldwide.
． Architect stable, maintainable and reusable front-end systems with clean, modular patterns.
．Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues.
．Continuously track, learn and apply the latest industry best practices, design patterns, tools and technologies.

【What We‘re Looking For】
．3+ years of strong web development experience building highly-reliable, mission-critical software, with frequent production releases.
．Expertise in React, Redux, ES6 and TypeScript.
．An open-minded and passionate team player who learns proactively.

【Bonus Points If You Have】
．Familiar with UI/UX
．Experience with large-scale web application performance optimization.
．Understand search engine ranking factors.
．Deep knowledge of best practices, information security, and API developing experience.
．Portfolio of latest projects.

【Our Recruiting Process】
All processes are expected to be completed within 2-4 weeks, we’ll adjust our hiring process due to different circumstances:

1.Online Interview - You’ll have a one-hour online interview with our Frontend team members, mostly about past projects and coding questions.
2.  Take Home Test - You’ll receive a take-home test, as we expect you to finish the test within 1-2 weeks.
3. 1st Interview - You’ll have a 30-minute session with one of the Talent Operations Partners (HR), where we would want to get to know more about your experience and background, what you’re passionate about..etc. Also, you’ll have a coding interview with the Frontend team members and leader.
4. 2nd Interview -  You’ll have a 30-minute interview with our CEO and another 30-minute interview with our Talent Operations Manager (HR Manager).

．Mainly use Go and Node.js.
．Applying microservices architecture with Kubernetes on GCP.
．Using various databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ScyllaDB, Redis, etc., according to different requirements.
．Go service architecture is mainly based on Go Kit architecture, with in-house developed codegen tools and gRPC as the main communication framework.
．Using CircleCI for CI/CD, system testing and deployment more secure and stable.

About Our Team

．20+ backend developers.
．Weekly meetings to discuss issues, tech stack & tools.
．Bi-weekly study group to learn new tech stack.
．Monthly engineering seminar.
．Regular system design review.

【What You'll Do】

．Fully understand the features and framework of our product.
．Handle high traffic issues and provide a smooth and stable user experience, including infrastructure & database setup and optimization, cache mechanism, data migration, etc
．Explore and introduce new tech stack(s) in line with our needs, and leave ample time for developers to conduct evaluations.
．Implement and optimize shared libraries and development tools.
．Develop readable and maintainable code in line with requirements.
．Participate in various learning discussions within the group, such as weekly meetings, study groups and design review meetings, etc.

【What We're Looking For】

．3+ years of experience in backend development
．Familiar with Golang
．Experience in Unit Testing and Integration testing
．Experience in using Git 
．Experience using database(PostgreSQL/MySQL/MariaDB) and NoSQL database

【Bonus Points If You Have】

．Experience in DevOps
．Experience in using GCP, AWS, Azure
．Familiar with MongoDB
．Familiar with Redis
．Familiar with Node.js
．Familiar with k8s
．Familiar with CI/CD pipeline
．Family with database performance tuning
．Willing to participate in an open-source community

【Compensation】

．NTD 1,000,000 ~ 1,600,000 / year

神坊資訊IDC為通過ISO27001認證機房，透過網管監控中心（NOC）提供7 X 24監控服務，協助企業資訊通訊服務管理、品質監控、異常狀態排除作業。

【職務內容】

【職務需求】

2. 具備基礎文書處理作業能力，Excel、Word、PowerPoint。
3. 有責任感、主動積極解決問題，重視團隊合作，具協調溝通能力；對學習技術有興趣及熱忱。

2. 熟悉 LibreNMS,Grafana, kibana ,python，有實務經驗佳。
3. 具有CCNA、VCP或其它資訊相關專業認證尤佳。

job_name: AD Associate Product Manager
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方式】請至：https://grnh.se/9c7822801us 投遞履歷， 我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 AD Associate Product Manager 加入我們，帶著團隊去探索 MarTech 的商業機會，加入這個熱愛挑戰的團隊，一起打造出千萬人關注，影響世代交流、思考的社群。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】

對於廣告富有極大的熱忱？
成為 Dcard AD Associate Product Manager，你將親手打造千萬流量用戶與品牌間良好的廣告生態系！

・充滿挑戰的工作環境
你將和編制完整的 PM 團隊、工程、設計等領域的夥伴一起共事。你將會成為打造廣告產品的負責人，也將參與數百萬使用者的產品策略，為每個階段訂定明確的執行方案與測試項目，在快速變化的環境中，磨練自己的專案經驗！

・充沛資源與培訓機會
你將有機會從參與專案管理、產品策略，一路成為 Dcard 未來事業體的負責人。和社群、電商或跨國市場的 Product Manager 共事，其中一位 Product Manager 更會成為你的 mentor，帶領你一步一步在 Dcard 團隊成長！完整的 Training Program 與培訓機會，幫助你打造硬實力，成為打造百萬使用者產品幕後推手。


【關於廣告團隊】

廣告團隊致力於打造用戶與品牌間的良好媒合生態系，是 Dcard 面向品牌方提供廣告、行銷企劃等服務的團隊。
你將與產品開發團隊、以及廣告銷售團隊共同協作，打造符合市場需求的產品。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】

・與 Senior Product Manager 一同協作，理解使用者、用戶的需求，將其轉換為可執行的計畫：
   ．透過市場需求和競爭者調查，產出規劃商業與產品企劃書；
   ． 訂定產品規格及目標拆解實踐階段，並為每個階段制定明確目標與執行方案。
・與不同角色共識並理解他們的想法，讓整體執行過程順利進行：
   ．與前後端工程師合作：討論不同環節實作上的可行性及難易度。
   ．與設計師合作：發想合適的使用流程和資訊呈現方式，推出最佳設計方案。
   ．與銷售團隊合作，制定新專案的上線策略; 在專案上線後進行推廣，並持續追蹤數據成效。

【申請資格】

・希望找到喜歡創新、充滿熱情的你。
・沒有任何背景限定，假設今天你是工程師、數據分析師、或是有創業相關經驗的夥伴，想要加入團隊打造產品影響力，我們也很歡迎你的加入！ 
・擁有不超過 2 年的全職工作經驗（也歡迎應屆畢業生申請唷！）



【我們期待看到一個優秀的 AD Associate Product Manager 具備以下能力】

・對廣告、新創跟各種科技產品有極大的熱忱。
・具備積極的心態，樂於擁抱改變、能快速地適應各種變動，並勇於面對各種未知的挑戰。
・擁有很棒的人際溝通技巧，樂於與各種角色協調、合作。
・能說也能聽，不只可以清楚地表達自己的想法，也能同理、理解他人的意見與聲音。
・邏輯清晰，並具備良好的數據整理能力。
・對商業新知有高度好奇心與敏銳度，喜歡接受未知挑戰。
・願意主動學習、同理溝通、自我管理。

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】

・有數位廣告經驗。
・有新創相關實習/正職工作經驗

【薪資】

・面議

job_name: Security Engineer (資安工程師)
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【立刻投遞】請至 : https://grnh.se/f05eb83a1us 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 Security Engineer 加入我們，找出 Dcard 潛在的漏洞，預防可能發生的資安問題，提供給使用者可以放心交流的社群服務。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】

Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【簡單介紹 Security 團隊】

Dcard 資安團隊的將高度密集與開發團隊、IT 合作，找出系統潛在的漏洞與風險，你將透過真實的駭客手法找出系統潛在的漏洞與風險，並協助開發團隊修補問題。主動了解新型態的攻擊手法與漏洞消息，提昇團隊安全意識，並且對新開發項目或目前架構提供安全架構設計 (Security Architecture and Design) 或程式碼審查 (Secure Source Code Review)。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】

短期

 ‧ 熟悉相關系統的基礎架構與既有資安防護機制。
 ‧ 嘗試找出既有系統漏洞，並與開發團隊討論如何修複。

長期

 ‧ 全面瞭解整體的架構，跟據目前實作改善架構來提昇防護能力。
 ‧ 持續學習新技術、主動分享資安新知來提升團隊資安水準。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Security Engineer 具備以下能力】

 ‧ 具有滲透測試的相關經驗
 ‧ 熟悉作業系統、各式網站系統與資料庫弱點原理
 ‧ 至少熟悉一種主流網頁程式語言 (PHP、Node.js、Golang、Python、Java 等)，並具有程式碼安全審查能力 (Secure Source Code Review)
 ‧ 熟悉一種 Script (例如 Shell Script、Python、Ruby 等等)，能用來協助日常工作
 ‧ 熟悉滲透測試、弱點掃描、系統掃描，善用各式資安分析與檢測工具 (Burpsuite、Fiddler、Charles 等)
 ‧ 具有良好的學習能力、個性積極主動、細心嚴謹

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】

 ‧ 熟悉任一 Cloud Service (例如 GCP、AWS、Azure)，熟悉 Cloud Security 更佳
 ‧ 有漏洞通報經驗 (CVE、HackerOne、HITCON ZeroDay 等相似通報平台)
 ‧ 擁有資安相關證照 (OSCP、OSWE、Hack The Box Pro Lab 等)
 ‧ 曾在國內或國外資安研討會發表相關技術研究 (HITCON、BlackHat、CODEBLUE 等)
 ‧ 參與或舉辦過資安競賽 (CTF、King of Hill、Attack & Defense)
 ‧ 參與資安社群經驗 (CHROOT、UCCU Hacker、BALSN、BAMBOOFOX、若渴計畫 等)
 ‧ 曾寫過資安技術、漏洞分析、CTF Writeup 等相關文章或部落格
 ‧ 擁有 Android 或 iOS APP 挖掘漏洞經驗 

【為什麼要加入我們？】

 ‧ 充滿熱情的跨國團隊，用成長型思維打造快速成長的組織。
 ‧ 打造社群、電商、廣告、跨國市場等挑戰性產品，參與各類新想法、新產品甚至是新市場的誕生！
 ‧ 擁有高頻率的溝通文化，夥伴頻繁地討論合作並給予回饋。
 ‧ 隨時取得書籍、課程講座、國內外 Conference 等任何資源，持續學習就是 Dcard 團隊的核心精神。
 ‧ 彈性的工作氛圍，不論你是工程師、營運、設計等任何角色，你將擁有彈性工時安排的空間。
 ‧ 重視每個相聚的時刻 ，不論是線上或線下，舉辦節慶派對各式分享會，讓大家在團隊生活得更開心。

【注意事項】

 ‧ 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡你！
 ‧ 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。

job_name: Content Specialist_Mexico
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Please Apply Here】https://grnh.se/f00f6e6d1us

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to new markets as well. 

Facing the quick changing field of social media, we hope to find more talent to join Dcard. We need a Content Specialist_Malaysia to join us and spearhead content operations, work cross culturally and ensure success in our new ambitions. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Our New Market Team】
Thousands of people share their stories on Dcard everyday. The New Market team is a part of the Overseas Team, working alongside our Hong Kong and Japan teams. You will work with Market Research, Advertising and Product Management teams to share our product on the global stage. 

【What’ll You Do】
* Routine community operations, collect and verify information in response to current trends and prompt more diverse discussions on the site 
* Plan and curate forums and activities to encourage increased usage and interesting articles 
* Collect, evaluate and optimize content data, propose strategies to enrich overall content and optimize content management process 
* Other miscellaneous tasks involving new markets

【Requirements】
* At least 2 years of content related social media operating experience 
* Ability to communicate cross culturally 
    * Native level Spanish
    * Business level English 
* Good writing skills, data insight and analysis abilities 
* Familiar with social media services, highly sensitive to current media and internet trends and able to drive discussion based on observations
* Possess project management capabilities, able to plan and arrange project timelines and integrate resources
* Great interpersonal skills
* Detail-oriented, proactive and willing to learn and adapt 

【Even Better If】
* Experience working at a fast-paced startup 
* Experience working cross culturally 
* Dcard/Dtto user; familiar with Dcard’s ecology and functions 
* Conversational level Chinese
* Able to use marketing tools such as SEO
* Able to use data analysis tools such as SQL
* You are a content creator or you have experience posting on Dcard

【Why Join Us?】
* Passionate multicultural team with a growth mindset 
* Take part in social, e-commerce, advertising and new market products
* Frequent, transparent communication 
* Books, classes, conferences provided for continuous learning 
* Flexible work hours and a flexible environment 
* Online and offline celebrations with a great team

【Location】
* Dcard Taipei Headquarters / Remote work
    * If you’re not located in Taiwan, Dcard may invite you to join as a contractor role.

【Salary】
* Negotiable, adjusted based on skill set and previous experience

【Notice】
* If we think there is an opportunity for collaboration we will contact you as soon as possible!
* Unsuitable candidates may not receive further notice.

At Dcard, every member is equal, and we value and celebrate differences. We strive to provide a diverse and inclusive environment, giving respect to every member. We believe that equality and diversity can bring infinite possibilities for innovation. Dcard maintains a non-discriminatory employment environment, giving equal opportunity to all candidates.

job_name: 後端資深工程師 (Ruten露天市集－技術處)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
露天市集誠摯邀請有志的backend開發者一同優化歷史悠久的老招牌 『露天市集』 !
We are looking for backend enthusiasts to join us on a journey to improve
and enhance our prestigious auction site "Ruten"!

身為台灣電商龍頭之一，我們不斷的精進在提供優質服務，而我們無法做到如果沒有快樂開發者們的幫忙;
我們需要您來加入這個大家庭一同讓露天再次偉大!
As the leading pioneer in e-commerce business, we stride to provide with excellence and caring,and we could not do this without our happy-coding developers.
So we want YOU to be part of this big family to make Ruten great again!

｜What we do｜
(1)將需求單位所提出的網站概念圖像與流程，分析其功能與需求，
並轉化成具體的程式碼。
(2)開發 Restful API，並與其他團隊串接測試。
(3)既有功能維護與優化(重構)
(4)系統設計與分析
(5)Swagger 文件撰寫

｜What we are looking for｜
(1)重視團隊合作。
(2)尊重不同型態的夥伴。
(3)自我管理與約束 。
(4)重視使用者體驗。
(5)有挑戰大流量、超多使用者、巨量商品資料及交易資料網站的熱誠。
(6)良好的溝通與聆聽能力。
(7)具有PHP 開發經驗三年以上。

｜Our backend stack 露天正在使用的技術｜
●PHP (7.4)
●slim framework
●Mysql
●Oracle
●Gitlab
●Swagger

｜Requirement 希望你已經會｜
●PHP knowledge
●SQL 使用經驗
●Linux 操作
●OOP

｜Why choose Ruten｜
組織扁平，沒有繁文縟節，良好的團隊溝通與氛圍，
不定時的技術分享，任何人都能夠分享技術/方法/流程給團隊，
與團隊成員持續精進和成長，是我們共同努力的目標，
不只是看著spec 做事，而是一個問題解決者，
主動發現問題並提出解決問題的方法。

如果你也認同，或是有更好的想法，我們誠摯邀請你/妳加入，與我們一起努力。

job_name: 【寵物公園】資深寵物美容師 / 寵物美容師 / 寵物美容店長 -台北市大安區
cust_name: 萬達寵物事業股份有限公司
job_detail:
▍喜愛毛寶貝、熱愛毛寶貝，沒有毛寶貝就吃不下飯、睡不著覺、人生沒有樂趣的貓奴、狗努、毛爸媽、毛家庭，您還在職涯路上尋尋覓覓，追求自我嗎?
萬達寵物事業股份有限公司，【寵物公園】是全台最知名的寵物連鎖體系集團，目前正大力發展，成為全台最強的寵物生活產業集團。2022年到2025年快速展店中，【我們正在尋找跟我們一起挑戰與改變寵物美容產業的事業夥伴!】，「『您可以在寵物公園~找到自己人生的可能』」。

▍【讓我們用『愛』共同打造更美好的『毛宇宙』】，寵物公園目前正在尋找跟我們一樣熱愛毛寶貝，共同讓產業變更好「傳遞溫暖、守護毛寶貝幸福的您」，打造屬於我們與毛寶貝共同的幸福人生。

▍我們誠心邀請你來了解下列職缺，為自己的人生尋找更多的火花：
㊜零售通路中：最熱心、最熱情、溫暖服務的「寵物美容助理」
㊜寵物產業中：最專業、最暖心、體貼守護的「寵物美容師」
㊜在服務產業中：把一家寵物美容店經營的井井有條、客人滿意度破表的「超級寵物美容長」
㊜在連鎖通路中：想讓寵物美容產業變得更好、具有遠見、數字觀念、跨區跨店經營的領導力的「美容督導」
★歡迎您加入我們，投入寵物美容產業，為毛小孩打造乾淨亮眼新氣象★

▍【工作簡介】
這是一個以服務為核心的工作與產業，會因為工作職務不同而有所差異，但滿滿的【真誠關懷、暖心服務、熱情與愛】是公司內的標準配備。
其他的工作可能包含：
1.提供親切友善的服務：毛孩美容的關心、照顧、諮詢以滿足寵物美容造型、寵物沙龍、寵物SPA、住宿服務…等工作。
2.美容室內外、環境、美容器材設備、美容耗材的維護，讓貴賓們有優質舒適、放鬆滿意的生活消費空間。
3.完成一家店寵物美容運作的日常，如：洗澡、吹整、剪腳指甲、刷牙、耳朵清潔、肛門腺清潔、運用電剪或專業剪刀完成造型修剪…等，美容師以上需具有在指定時間內採純手剪完成指定造型的能力歐。

▍【工作地點、時間】
＊上班地點：我們採區域排班，原則上在編製店上班，但會需要因為友店需要支援而跨店上班。
＊上班時間：每日上班9小時(內含有一小時休息間，原則上每四小時休息30分鐘，休息時間會需要根據美容店工作現場狀況調配歐) 。
＊排班方式：每月排班一次、依據區域內的人力需求安排調度，會有排班規則供遵循，您的意願我們一定會尊重。
＊加班管理：我們希望大家都能夠高效率工作、準時下班，但如果需要加班只要事先知會主管或是被主管拜託幫忙協助工作而致加班，都可以到系統申請加班，依法核發加班費，「多勞多得是我們不變的原則、辛苦也會獲得重視」。

▍【薪資制度】
〘獨一無二的薪資制度〙
＊我們定期進行薪資服務檢核，以零售連鎖業市場的『前25%』為薪酬標準。
＊薪資結構：『超高保障起薪+經營分紅+競賽獎金+專案任務津貼+津貼補助+專案獎金』。
＊任職滿三個月者享年終獎金，依據公司當年度營運及個人績效核發，平均1~1.5個月月薪，績效卓越者最高可以領取到4個月年終獎金。
＊起薪：全省有不同起薪，助理保障起薪28K、美容師保障薪資區間居於30K~34K、美容長保障薪資區間居於35~40K，歡迎與我們了解洽詢。
＊美容有個人點數獎金+團體獎金，績效中等者平均獎金約為3,000~5,000，績效卓越點單月獎金有機會上看6,000~10,000。
＊資深美容師或美容另可享薪資保障方案、保障月薪40K~45K。

▍【企業優勢】
★月休8~13天的休假制度(含國定假日全年休假天數平均挪調)。
★完善工作培訓制度及教育訓練規劃給您學習成長的機會。
★新人引導適應：到職有完善的新人課培訓期，有教練進行工作指導與養成，協助適應與上手，階段式人才培育養成。
★寵物員購優惠：商品享有員購優惠、本身是毛家庭一族的您不容錯過!
★晉升管道暢通：每半年固定評估、只要您準備好了，歡迎挑戰職涯晉升與加薪，持續展店~晉升加薪的機會掌握在您手上。
★勇於溝通對話的文化：給予各級人員表達心聲溝通對話的機會，我們未必凡事都能做到盡善盡美，但我們鼓勵溝通與對話，小步快跑，持續優化與進步，變得更好。
★OMO線上線下全方位整合的零售通路，打造專業的寵物管家。

▍【福利】
1.到職滿三個月即享七天特休(採特休預給制)。
2.高績效獎金及年終獎金平均1-1.5個月起(優於同業)。
3.三節獎金及生日禮金。
4.好幾百萬等級的尾牙及聚餐活動獲補助(大獎中獎率達20%、全員通通有獎、通路中最優) 。
5.每月都有教育訓練的課可以上，外面很貴的課，公司開給您，並提供教育訓練補助。
6.免費提供團體保險、為您多一分呵護與保障。
7.任職滿半年、每半年提供兩張電影票或相關休閒補助，工作之餘不忘生活平衡。
8.不定期的訂餐犒賞、飲料及下午茶獎勵。

▍【我們團隊的特色是這樣的】
＊「扁平化的溝通文化」
我們目的都是把事情做好，如果有話想說，就勇敢的說出來！
團隊有著新創的靈魂，樂於嘗試各種不同的挑戰
＊「難題的交流」
你的問題可能就是我的問題，大家集思廣益就沒有問題！
＊「友善的工作團隊」
沒有配備刀械的主管，沒有開著手機發呆同事，沒有裝忙的老闆，更沒有上演八點檔的團隊文化、我們認真執行任務，保持溝通暢通，鼓勵創新與優化。

job_name: Sales toB | 廣告專案副/經理 SAE/AM
cust_name: 女人迷_吾思傳媒股份有限公司
job_detail:
吾思傳媒相信好的產品與服務，可以為生活帶來美好的體驗，並為社會創造更多價值。我們合作超過百家品牌，跨足十六產業，結合對使用者的需求理解，串連起品牌與使用者溝通的橋樑，帶來創新的品牌體驗，改變數位廣告的既有模式。

我們期待你能夠發揮媒體社群的專業，理解品牌客戶的核心需求，結合族群需要，以跳脫框架的前瞻性思考，帶來實際落地執行的專案規劃，為品牌、社群、公司三方達到目標，並能開創新商業模式。

你需要負責的工作內容
* 品牌客戶經營：與品牌夥伴關係維護，確定專案的內容規格與安排。
* 專案執行追蹤：掌握專案確實執行、追蹤與達成成效，並結合品牌與吾思傳媒，搭建與用戶的溝通橋樑。
* 專案報表與結案簡報製作：為公司、客戶與自己提供完整的專案內容與成效彙整。

你需必備的條件​
* 有 2 年以上數位媒體專案執行經驗
* 有分辨內容好壞的判斷能力
* 有效運用文件與工具，進行合作進度追蹤與掌握能力
* 有資訊整合能力
* 喜愛品牌並關注產業動向

如果有會更棒
* 熟悉並喜愛吾思傳媒相關服務
* 提案企劃發想與製作能力
* 實體活動專案執行經驗

如果你有信心能夠勝任這份工作，歡迎趕快填寫表單（https://womany.net/s/yjmjef7），同時在表單內附上：
1. 履歷：履歷是我們了解你的第一印象，請在履歷中說明： (1) 學歷與工作經驗。 (2) 你參與過的專案與計畫，說明這些專案與計劃的成果、獲得的經驗、知識或技能與這份職位的關聯。

2. 一份作業：
身為 AE，需為合作品牌曝光其產品，並為其撰寫文章切點，你會如何以至少 3 個段落的架構，編寫這篇文章？以下為品牌與產品相關資料，請依據現有資訊，自由發想，試寫「文章大綱」（不需寫完整文章）：A. 品牌名稱：女人迷
B. 品牌精神：支持並啟發人們的成長，鼓勵性別的對話，創造影響力，讓每個人都能成為自己。
C. 產品名稱：ME TIME 女私沐浴露 - 日常愛用組（150ml x 3 入）
D. 產品特色：請閱讀此頁面 ( https://shop.womany.net/products/metime-upgrade-perfectset-1)。
E. TA 設定： 24 - 35Y 生理女性（女人迷主 TA）

3. 其他讓我們更了解你的文件（如作品集、介紹推薦信）

job_name: Staff iOS Engineer
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Application】Please submit your resume via https://grnh.se/4dba739f1 , resumes submitted via this link will be reviewed primarily.

We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. We continue to make impactful influence in the social media, advertising and e-commerce fields. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market.

As a Staff iOS Developer at Dcard, you will collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers create tools that accelerate growth and build products that matter. Join our team of developers building the social network for the next generation. We code in a fresh monolithic repository, and most importantly, we're never afraid to take new and bold approaches to conquer challenges.


If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About our iOS Team】
You’ll join a cross-functional team (which is called a delivery team at Dcard), working closely with product managers, engineers, and designers to develop either our social media, e-commerce, advertising or global products. You’ll face a lot of interesting challenges and work on reliable and maintainable products with high traffic. We focus on features and framework, and are not afraid to experiment with and embrace new tech stacks and tools to serve a better user experience.

【What you'll do】
·  Building scalable, well-designed mobile apps with industry best practice.
·  Leading complicated, high-risk projects and lead the communication within the team.
·  In charge of both technical and non-technical collaborations. Manage requests from stakeholders and complete missions with limited resources.
·  Build flexible structures, and facilitate both quality and the speed of development in the dynamic environment.
·  Face the challenges proactively, find the problems, and lead technical team to adopt all changes coming.
·  Help develop team members’ competency, improve overall team techniques and expand regarding needs.  

【What We’re Looking For】
·  Solid knowledge in software engineering and experienced in App development with knowledges and practices.
·  Expertise in Swift with 7+  years of experience within iOS development.
·  Experienced in cross-function ( mobile, backend, frontend ) projects and handle request with multi-function, technical limitation and budget with balance. 

【Bonus Points If You Have】
·  Experience in maintenance and testing, refactoring of Legacy Code
·  Experience in building launched App with high-quality UI / UX design principles. 
·  Handle technical innovation and development with priorities
·  Experience in Social Media, Video related product
·  You’re good at communication and a Team Player

job_name: Content Specialist_Singapore
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Please Apply Here】https://grnh.se/506c240c1us

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to new markets as well. 

Facing the quick changing field of social media, we hope to find more talent to join Dcard. We need a Content Specialist_Singapore to join us and spearhead content operations, work cross culturally and ensure success in our new ambitions. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Our New Market Team】
Thousands of people share their stories on Dcard everyday. The New Market team is a part of the Overseas Team, working alongside our Hong Kong and Japan teams. You will work with Market Research, Advertising and Product Management teams to share our product on the global stage. 

【What’ll You Do】
* Routine community operations, collect and verify information in response to current trends and prompt more diverse discussions on the site 
* Plan and curate forums and activities to encourage increased usage and interesting articles 
* Collect, evaluate and optimize content data, propose strategies to enrich overall content and optimize content management process 
* Other miscellaneous tasks involving new markets

【Requirements】
* At least 2 years of content related social media operating experience 
* Dcard/Dtto user; familiar with Dcard’s ecology and functions 
* Ability to communicate cross culturally 
    * Business level Chinese
    * Business level English 
* Good writing skills, data insight and analysis abilities 
* Familiar with social media services, highly sensitive to current media and internet trends and able to drive discussion based on observations
* Possess project management capabilities, able to plan and arrange project timelines and integrate resources
* Great interpersonal skills
* Detail-oriented, proactive and willing to learn and adapt 

【Even Better If】
* Experience working at a fast-paced startup 
* Experience working cross culturally 
* Able to use marketing tools such as SEO
* Able to use data analysis tools such as SQL
* You are a content creator or you have experience posting on Dcard

【Why Join Us?】
* Passionate multicultural team with a growth mindset 
* Take part in social, e-commerce, advertising and new market products
* Frequent, transparent communication 
* Books, classes, conferences provided for continuous learning 
* Flexible work hours and a flexible environment 
* Online and offline celebrations with a great team

【Location】
* Dcard Taipei Headquarters 

【Salary】
* Negotiable 

【Notice:】
* If we think there is an opportunity for collaboration we will contact you as soon as possible!
* Unsuitable candidates may not receive further notice.

At Dcard, every member is equal, and we value and celebrate differences. We strive to provide a diverse and inclusive environment, giving respect to every member. We believe that equality and diversity can bring infinite possibilities for innovation. Dcard maintains a non-discriminatory employment environment, giving equal opportunity to all candidates.

job_detail:
【Application】Please submit your resume via https://grnh.se/6486602c1us, resumes submitted via this link will be reviewed primarily.



We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. We continue to make impactful influence in the social media, advertising and e-commerce fields. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market.

As a Principal Product Manager at Dcard, you will act as an inspirational role model for our product team, and collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About our Product team】

You will collaborate closely with product team to shape product strategies across teams, decomposing them and giving teams dedicated remits, and cooperate with product managers, engineers and designers to verify ideas and develop products in different markets. In Dcard’s Product Team, you will face challenges on how to deliver product fulfilling users needs, interact with various stakeholders, and create user-centric experiences with millions of users and the next evolutionary step for Dcard.

【What you'll do】

．Act as a mentor and an influencer for product team, build and implement effective long-term product strategies.
．Think in the user’s and business perspective, verify product assumptions of market requirements and/or opportunities, and turn into an executable plan.
．Create and drive impactful product roadmaps in a fast-paced environment with ambiguity by the research of users and data analysis.
．Work with UX/Market Researcher and Data Analyst, drive experiment-driven analysis, stipulate the product observing indicator, and utilize all methods of A/B/n testing for a better understanding.
．Understand and cooperate with all the roles of the team, knowing different thoughts of the roles to make the whole execution process smooth.

【What We’re Looking For】

．7+ years of experience in large scale global product management.
．Develop the product roadmap from both the user’s point of view and business perspective.
．Believe in Human-Centered Design. Not only care about what we do but also care more about the reasons for what we do.
．Strong business acumen and proficient analytical skills. Can disassemble the problem that you observe and infer the sources behind the problem with logic.
．Excellent communication skills and know-how to coordinate and work with different roles in Dcard.

【Bonus Points If You Have】

．Enthusiastic about inspiring and coaching others.
．Familiar with startups culture and experienced in social networks products.
．Experienced in leading a team to launch an important product or project in fast-paced environment.

【Compensation】

．Negotiable

·  Experience in optimizing app performance.
·  Implement SSOT and Flux on launched products.
·  Experience in developing on other platforms.
·  Strong knowledge and experience of iOS UI/UX design principles. 

【Our Recruiting Process】
All processes are expected to be completed within 2-4 weeks, our hiring process is subject to adjustment based on individual circumstances:

1. Online Interview - You’ll have a one-hour online interview with our iOS team members, mostly related to past projects and coding questions.
2. 1st Interview - You’ll have a 30-minute session with one of the Talent Operations Partners (HR), where we would want to get to know more about your experience and background, what you’re passionate about..etc. You’ll also have a coding interview with the iOS team members and leader.
3. 2nd Interview -  You’ll have a 30-minute interview with our CEO and another 30-minute interview with our Talent Operations Manager (HR Manager).

job_name: Principal Data Analyst - Product
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞辦法】
請至：https://grnh.se/e8f43bec1us 投遞履歷， 我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

【關於 Dcard】
Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 Principal Data Analyst — Product 加入我們，你所做的決策將能立刻接觸到來自世界各地的使用者們，在他們的生活中創造美好的體驗。加入這個熱愛挑戰的團隊，一起打造被千萬人喜愛與使用的產品！


【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】
Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商、廣告等領域，服務對象從學生到社會人士。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。在 Dcard 從事分析工作，你將能接觸千萬用戶所累積的行為數據，橫跨社群、電商等多元領域與多個跨國市場，幫助你迅速累積技術能力與培養開放性思維。Dcard 提供具有潛力的舞台，等待熱愛挑戰的你一起加入，一同打造來自台灣的世界級網路公司！

【關於產品團隊】
身為 Principal Data Analyst — Product，你需要發起跨團隊的大型專案優化既有的數據工具，幫助產品團隊能以更快速便利的方式取得數據洞察、制定重大決策。你將和 Product Manager 一同合作，透過探索大量的資料，從中了解使用者的需求，在產品發展上提供清晰的指引。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】
· 發起跨團隊的大型專案，推動不同職能的夥伴一起檢視並優化既有的數據架構與工具。
· 幫助數據團隊發展團隊 roadmap，導入不同發展階段所需的技術與工具。
· 參與決策層級的重要決策過程，以數據顧問的角色提供客觀且富有洞察的建議，成為推動公司前進的重要舵手。
· 因應公司戰略營運方針，發起產品相關實驗、制定產品策略並追蹤使用者行為。 
· 與產品開發團隊緊密合作，協助團隊達成產品目標。
· 收集、整併與分析不同來源的數據，根據需求製作 Dashboard 報表或數據工具，提供數據洞察給不同層級的決策者，幫助提升決策品質。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Principal Data Analyst — Product 具備以下能力】
· 具備五年以上網路產品的專案實作分析經驗。
· 優秀的溝通與表達能力，能長期和 C-Level 的 Stakeholders 溝通合作。
· 擁有豐富的 A/B Testing 實務經驗，熟悉並具備足夠的能力導入新技術提升實驗的效率與品質，幫助發展高品質的決策。
· 擁有良好的人際互動能力及成長心態，能領導並且協助團隊內夥伴成長與發展，幫助團隊持續突破。
· 具備優秀的專案與利害關係人管理技巧，能權衡並且推進短期帶來效益的專案、與對團隊長期任務有幫助的專案。
· 了解數位行銷趨勢並具有良好的自主學習能力，能快速上手各式分析工具。
· 熟悉 Data Studio 或其他視覺化工具，並能自己將各方資料整合與運用。
· 專精 SQL 語法，擁有從關聯式資料庫查詢資料的經驗。

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】
· 具有大型新創或科技公司相關工作經驗，能迅速適應速度極快及跨部門協作的工作環境。
· 具有執行或負責跨國產品的相關經驗。 


【為什麼要加入我們？】
· 在 Dcard 成為世界級網路公司的快速成長過程中，擔任團隊中不可或缺能在重要決策中提出數據洞察的核心角色。
· 充滿熱情的跨國團隊，用成長型思維打造快速成長的組織。
· 打造社群、電商、廣告、跨國市場等挑戰性產品，參與並促成新想法、新產品甚至是新市場的誕生！
· 擁有高頻率的溝通文化，夥伴頻繁地討論合作並給予回饋。
· 隨時取得書籍、課程講座、國內外 Conference 等任何資源，持續學習就是 Dcard 團隊的核心精神。
· 彈性的工作氛圍，不論你是工程師、營運、設計等任何角色，你將擁有彈性工時安排的空間。
· 重視每個相聚的時刻 ，不論是線上或線下，舉辦節慶派對各式分享會，讓大家在團隊生活得更開心。

【注意事項】
· 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡您！
· 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。

job_name: Architect
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Application】Please submit your resume via https://grnh.se/5e0863681us  , resumes submitted via this link will be reviewed primarily

We are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together.

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here.

As a strong and emerging international company, we are on a mission to spark connections and bring people together. We continue to make impactful influence in the social media, advertising and e-commerce fields. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to Hong Kong, Japan, and the APAC & LATAM market. 

As an Architect at Dcard, you will collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter and create tools that accelerate growth. Join our team of developers to build the social network of the next generation. We code in a fresh monolithic repository and ship code every few hours, and most importantly, we're never afraid of using new and bold approaches to conquer challenges.

If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Our Backend Team】

As a Backend Developer at Dcard, you will collaborate closely with brilliant designers, product managers and developers to build products that matter and create tools that accelerate growth. Join our team to build the social network of the next generation. We use various tools to continuously deliver new ideas and implementations into production, and most importantly, we're enthusiastic about using new and bold approaches to conquer challenges.

Tech Stack

．Mainly use Go and Node.js.
．Applying microservices architecture with Kubernetes on GCP.
．Using various databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ScyllaDB, Redis, etc., according to different requirements.
．Go service architecture is mainly based on Go Kit architecture, with in-house developed codegen tools and gRPC as the main communication framework.
．Using CircleCI for CI/CD, system testing and deployment more secure and stable.

About Our Team

．20+ backend developers.
．Weekly meetings to discuss issues, tech stack & tools.
．Bi-weekly study group to learn new tech stack.
．Monthly engineering seminar.
．Regular system design review.

【What You'll Do】

．Fully understand the features and framework of our product.
．Handle high traffic issues and provide a smooth and stable user experience, including infrastructure & database setup and optimization, cache mechanism, data migration, etc
．Explore and introduce new tech stack(s) in line with our needs, and leave ample time for developers to conduct evaluations.
．Implement and optimize shared libraries and development tools.
．Develop readable and maintainable code in line with requirements.
．Participate in various learning discussions within the group, such as weekly meetings, study groups and design review meetings, etc.

【What We're Looking For】

．4+ years of experience in backend development.
．Familiar with Golang and Node.js.
．Familiar with software development process and all the testing methods.
．Familiar with the system troubleshooting and efficiency adjustment.
．Familiar with database (PostgreSQL/MySQL/MariaDB) and NoSQL (MongoDB) database.
．Familiar with any Cloud (GCP/AWS/Azure).
．Familiar with Kubernetes and the related ecosystem.
．Be willing to participate in open-source community and try out open-source software.

【Bonus Points If You Have】

．Experience in the development and maintenance of high traffic systems.
．Familiar with frontend development tech stack.

job_name: Marketing & Operations Specialist_ Malaysia
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【Please Apply Here】https://grnh.se/17fd050d1us

Dcard is a social media platform devoted to creating a safe and free environment for ever-flowing ideas and extraordinary stories. Garnering the trust of the younger generation, our service attracts millions of active users and up to 18 million unique visitors per month. We have substantial influence and high penetration amongst the youth of Taiwan, but our ambitions do not stop here. Continuing our success in the Taiwan market, we are now expanding to new markets as well. 

Facing the quick changing field of social media, we hope to find more talent to join Dcard. We need a Marketing & Operations Specialist_Malaysia to join us and spearhead the expansion of new market marketing and operations, work cross culturally and ensure success in our new ambitions. If you are ready to take the leap, join us in creating an experience that connects people all around the world!

【About Our New Market Team】
Thousands of people share their stories on Dcard everyday. The New Market team is a part of the Overseas Team, working alongside our Hong Kong and Japan teams. You will work with Market Research, Advertising and Product Management teams to share our product on the global stage. 

【What You’ll Do】
* Formulate and execute marketing strategies for the Malaysian market, including online, physical marketing campaigns and other marketing channels to acquire users
* Propose long-term social media development strategies, maintain daily operations, and facilitate cooperation opportunities with cross-industry brands/KOLs to enhance brand value
* Collect information on product development, business strategy, and competitor analysis to propose Singapore market optimization 
* Gain insight through user feedback and observation of user behavior for the optimization of the Singapore market and products 
* Other miscellaneous tasks related to marketing and new market operations

【Requirements】
* At least 2 years of marketing related experience 
* Ability to communicate cross culturally 
    * Business level Chinese
    * Business level English 
* Great interpersonal skills
* Detail-oriented, proactive and willing to learn and adapt 
* Possess project management capabilities, able to plan and arrange schedules and integrate resources
* Familiar with social media services, highly sensitive to current events, media and internet trends and able to drive discussion based on observations
* Ability to use editing software (Illustrator, Photoshop)

【Even Better If】
* Dcard/Dtto user
* Experience working at a fast paced startup 
* Experience working cross culturally 
* Able to use marketing tools: GA, SEO 

【Why Join Us?】
* Passionate multicultural team with a growth mindset 
* Take part in social, e-commerce, advertising and new market products
* Frequent, transparent communication 
* Books, classes, conferences provided for continuous learning 
* Flexible work hours and a flexible environment 
* Online and offline celebrations with a great team

【Location】
* Dcard Taipei Headquarters 

【Salary】
* Negotiable 

【Notice】
* If we think there is an opportunity for collaboration we will contact you as soon as possible!
* Unsuitable candidates may not receive further notice.

At Dcard, every member is equal, and we value and celebrate differences. We strive to provide a diverse and inclusive environment, giving respect to every member. We believe that equality and diversity can bring infinite possibilities for innovation. Dcard maintains a non-discriminatory employment environment, giving equal opportunity to all candidates.

job_name: Senior UX Researcher
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方法】：請至 https://grnh.se/g23dl1831 投遞履歷，我們將以將該處的履歷為主

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 Senior UX Researcher 加入我們，獲得質化及量化研究結果後提出產品改善的決策方向；加入這個熱愛挑戰的團隊，一起打造被千萬人喜愛與使用的產品！

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】
Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的 UX Research Team】
你會和產品團隊一同合作，打造社群、電商、跨國市場等不同產品；你將專注優化使用者體驗，確保開發團隊打造出不同的使用者都喜歡的介面與功能。你也將與營運團隊合作，根據公司內部不同目標，進行使用者研究並透過數據觀察，獲得質化及量化研究結果後提出產品改善的決策方向，創造更多 Dcard Aha moment！

【你將在團隊參與...】
．產品團隊：
   ．產品開發初期，與 Product Manager、Product Designer 共同密切合作，執行縝密的使用者與產品研究，釐清產品策略需求與痛點。
   ．產品開發中後期，與 Product Manaer、Product Designer 共同協作，從使用者研究中去洞察轉化出產品優化方向。
．營運單位：
   ．了解使用者用戶研究，例如：協助 HR 團隊進行僱主品牌形象調研、協助日本團隊透過質化及量化研究結果去了解產品定位等。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Senior UX Researcher 具備以下能力】
．至少 5 年從事使用者研究的工作經驗，具備研究規劃與執行的能力。
．有信心成為（或已經是）世界級的 UX Researcher！
．豐富的用戶體驗研究方法和統計知識。
．理解且熟悉使用者訪談方法與面試溝通技巧。
．具備優秀的分析能力，能將觀察到的問題拆解，並有邏輯的推論出問題背後的原因。
．能從使用者的角度去理解產品，打造能讓使用者產生共鳴的產品。
．具備 Human-Centered Design 的思維，不只關心我們要做什麼，更在意為什麼我們要這麼做。
．擁有很棒的人際溝通技巧，懂得如何與公司中的不同角色協調、合作。

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】
．熟悉 SQL 語法，有從關聯式資料庫查詢資料的經驗。
．在新創或科技公司相關工作經驗，能迅速適應速度極快及跨部門協作的工作環境。
．擁有公開分享 (UX Knowledge Sharing）、帶領使用者研究工作坊 (UX Workshop）的經驗。
．熟悉社群產業，熱愛 Dcard，並熟悉 Dcard 上的各種用語
．流利的中文以及英文能力

【薪資待遇】
．60,000 - 80,000，或依經驗與能力面議

【注意事項】
．如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡你！
other: ．至少 5 年從事用戶研究工作的經驗。

job_name: Machine Learning Backend Engineer
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方法】：請至 https://grnh.se/ea85dbce1us 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard 來打造更好的產品。而機器學習團隊在 Dcard 是一個重要的團隊，這個職位主要會跟 Machine Learning Engineer 有大量的合作，去協助讓模型上線以及建構各式各樣的基礎建設，進而讓整個使用者體驗更好。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】
Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。每天都有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你將有機會提供客戶接觸到龐大的使用者，為客戶提供更多的價值與服務。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的工程團隊】
身為 Dcard 工程團隊的一員，除了功能面開發，你也會專注優化開發者體驗與架構，並評估導入新的技術。在 Dcard 你將會面臨許多有趣挑戰，著手開發流量大的產品，不斷調整並改善現有的架構，提供順暢的服務給千萬使用者。

1. Data Driven - 團隊內任何的分析與決策都是圍繞著重要指標運作，擬定產品開發目標時也都是依據 OKR 的設定來衡量是否有價值，藉此確保夥伴們都在同個軌道並朝著相同目標前進。比起仰賴感覺來判斷，我們更重視依靠數據來思考。
2. 快速前進 - 能夠跟一群很厲害的人一起工作，不論在技術或合作能力都會有顯著成長。且團隊步調很快，我們期待產品能夠快速前進，相對的每天也會遇到許多挑戰，像是如何把廣告系統架起來承受高流量，或是如何維持資料更新即時又快速等。
3. 流程優化 - 團隊很在意流程是否順暢，持續思考如何合作會更有效率。我們會捲起袖子，直接去改變困擾我們的事物，優化整個開發跟生活的體驗。
4. 持續成長 - 除了例行性的讀書會，我們會透過團隊內的 Developer Session ，了解不同 domain 的夥伴做過哪些專案；也會邀請團隊外部成員向我們分享其他團隊成功案例或開發過程。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】
· 開發機器學習專案相關系統（API / 計算流程 / 訓練流程優化，不包含機器學習演算法開發），例如：推薦系統開發
· 和其他同事一起合作調整開發 Data Infrastructure
· 開發機器學習 ETL pipeline 模板及相關推廣到合作團隊
· 協助建置 CI / CD 及其相關推廣到合作團隊
· 協助維護營運數據應用基礎建設
· 設計系統監控機制
· 和 Web Architect 合作開發 & 調整 Dcard 基礎建設

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Machine Learning Backend Engineer 具備以下能力】
· 熟悉 Python 且不排斥學習新語言
· 能夠寫出可讀性高、可維護、可延伸性的程式以及進行高品質的 code review
· 熟悉軟體專案開發流程
· 可以根據定義好的問題設計技術解決方案及系統
· 至少有一年以上的分散式系統 or Backend API 經驗
· 熟悉系統監控設計
· 熟悉以下其中一種或多種資料庫系統：MongoDB / Elasticsearch / Redis / Clickhouse / BigQuery
· 熟悉 Kubernetes 原理
· 有良好的溝通協作能力，能夠清楚的表達想法，並與團隊成員順利合作

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】
· 有過兩年以上大型分散式系統設計經驗
· 熟悉以下其中一種或多種領域的知識：文章推薦 / 廣告系統 / 電商系統
· 熟悉機器學習專案開發流程（包含資料處理, 模型上線流程以及 CI 相關設計)
· 熟悉以下其中一種分散式計算系統：Spark / Flink
· 熟悉 Airflow 建置
· 熟悉 Data Engineering 的知識
skill: Machine Learning

job_name: I188 Java電商平台開發工程師(可遠端工作)
cust_name: 台灣大哥大股份有限公司

job_name: 前端資深工程師 (Ruten露天市集－技術處)
cust_name: PChome Online_網路家庭國際資訊(股)公司
job_detail:
✦✦露天市集誠摯邀請有志的前端開發一同優化歷史悠久的老招牌 『露天市集』 ! We are looking for frontend enthusiasts to join us on a journey to improve and enhance our prestigious auction site "Ruten"!

身為台灣電商龍頭之一，我們不斷的精進於提供優質與創新服務，而如果沒有快樂開發者們的幫忙，我們無法做到！ 我們需要您來加入這個大家庭一同讓露天再次偉大！ As a leading pioneer in e-commerce, we strive to provide excellence and innovation, and we could not do this without our happy-coding developers. So we want YOU to be part of this big family to make Ruten great again!✦✦


｜What we do｜
• 開發與維護露天拍賣的功能(與使用者第一線接觸或後台相關頁面)
• 協助維護或引入前端開發技術與工具
• 協助建立前端工作文化與準則
• 協助推進前端技術棧與良好開發流程


｜What we are looking for｜
• 2+ years experience in frontend development 兩年以上前端開發經驗
• self-motivated and self-deciplined 自我管理與約束
• proactive 主動積極
• work well with others 與UI、後端、PO團隊合作
• able to nitpick design/UX flaws 對美觀與體驗缺陷無法容忍
• create elegant and useful solutions to solve complex business problems
• able to evaluate new and existing technologies and 
   make recommendations for application improvements 
   保持學習力，持續改善日常工作
• good communication skills 良好的溝通與聆聽能力
• data driven 數據說話而不是靠感覺


｜Our frontend stack 露天正在使用的前端技術｜
• Vue.js (with Vuex and Vue router)
• Less
• Webpack
• Git


｜Hope you already master 希望你已經會｜
• containerization
• automated testing
• continuous integration
• modern javascript frameworks besides Vue
• esbuild
• agile workflow


｜Why choose Ruten｜
組織扁平，沒有繁文縟節，良好的團隊溝通與氛圍，
不定時的技術分享，任何人都能夠分享技術/方法/流程給團隊，
與團隊成員持續精進和成長，是我們共同努力的目標，
不只是看著spec 做事，而是一個問題解決者，
主動發現問題並提出解決問題的方法。

如果你也認同，或是有更好的想法，我們誠摯邀請你/妳加入，與我們一起努力。
specialty: Git, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Screaming Frog SEO Spider
other:
．為理工相關科系優先
．熟悉 HTML CSS JavaScript Git
．熟悉網頁效能 SEO等觀念

job_detail:
【投遞方法】請至：https://grnh.se/0e0e7f6d1us 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard 來打造更好的產品。目前在工程團隊裡，我們正在尋找一個角色可以扮演產品和工程團隊之中的橋樑，共同創造出好的產品價值。同時也可以引領工程師們的職涯發展前進，讓整個團隊持續突破及進步。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】

Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。每天都有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你將有機會提供客戶接觸到龐大的使用者，為客戶提供更多的價值與服務。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的工程團隊】

身為 Dcard 工程團隊的一員，除了功能面開發，你也會專注優化開發者體驗與架構，並評估導入新的技術。在 Dcard 你將會面臨許多有趣挑戰，著手開發流量大的產品，不斷調整並改善現有的架構，提供順暢的服務給千萬使用者。

1. Data Driven - 團隊內任何的分析與決策都是圍繞著重要指標運作，擬定產品開發目標時也都是依據 OKR 的設定來衡量是否有價值，藉此確保夥伴們都在同個軌道並朝著相同目標前進。比起仰賴感覺來判斷，我們更重視依靠數據來思考。
2. 快速前進 - 能夠跟一群很厲害的人一起工作，不論在技術或合作能力都會有顯著成長。且團隊步調很快，我們期待產品能夠快速前進，相對的每天也會遇到許多挑戰，像是如何把廣告系統架起來承受高流量，或是如何即時維持資料更新等。
3. 流程優化 - 團隊很在意流程是否順暢，持續思考如何合作會更有效率。我們會捲起袖子，直接去改變困擾我們的事物，優化整個開發跟生活的體驗。
4. 持續成長 - 除了例行性的讀書會，我們會透過團隊內的 Developer Session ，了解不同 domain 的夥伴做過哪些專案；也會邀請團隊外部成員向我們分享其他團隊成功案例或開發過程。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】

·  帶領 Dcard 工程團隊參與產品開發及規劃，以技術角度完成公司目標。
·  與不同專業團隊的 stakeholders (例如 PM, BU managers, Marketing 夥伴）協調資源安排及產品策略評估。
·  管理及衡量工程團隊生產力及影響力。
·  引導團隊成員的職涯發展計畫。
·  負責所屬工程團隊招募策略制定。
·  與團隊成員及公司相關技術負責人建立與維持良好的工程團隊文化及流程。
·  與團隊成員及公司相關技術負責人一起制定所屬專案的技術願景。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Engineering Manager 具備以下能力】

·  有一年以上的 Engineering Manager 的經歷或兩年以上工程專案管理經驗，曾經帶領不同工程職能的的夥伴們（如同時帶領過 web frontend + backend + iOS + android) 一起達成目標。
·  五年以上軟體開發經驗，熟悉軟體專案開發流程。
·  良好的溝通技巧及產品思維。
·  可以根據定義好的問題設計技術解決方案。
·  熟悉軟體設計原則 (如 design principle, software architectures）

【如果你擁有以下能力、經驗與特質，那就更棒了！】

·  有 Tech Lead 經驗或系統架構師經驗為佳。
·  具有高流量或者大型系統開發經驗。
·  能夠執行高品質的 code review or design review。
·  面對不熟悉的議題（非技術相關，如人事或組織議題），能夠拆解問題並思考討論解決方案。

【薪資待遇】

·  面議

【注意事項】

·  如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡你！
·  若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。

job_name: Machine Learning Engineer, E-Commerce
cust_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【投遞方法】：請至 https://grnh.se/a1e5f4ac1us 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard 來打造更好的產品。而好物研究室在 Dcard 是一個重要的產品，為了讓整個好物研究室的使用體驗更好，我們期待這個角色可以利用統計與機器學習方法，去幫助好物研究室更好的媒合使用者跟商品，讓每個人每次在 Dcard 內都可以找到自己心目中的好東西。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】
Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。每天都有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你將有機會提供客戶接觸到龐大的使用者，為客戶提供更多的價值與服務。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的工程團隊】
1. Data Driven - 團隊內任何的分析與決策都是圍繞著重要指標運作，擬定產品開發目標時也都是依據 OKR 的設定來衡量是否有價值，藉此確保夥伴們都在同個軌道並朝著相同目標前進。比起仰賴感覺來判斷，我們更重視依靠數據來思考。
2. 快速前進 - 能夠跟一群很厲害的人一起工作，不論在技術或合作能力都會有顯著成長。且團隊步調很快，我們期待產品能夠快速前進，相對的每天也會遇到許多挑戰，像是如何把廣告系統架起來承受高流量，或是如何維持資料更新即時又快速等。
3. 流程優化 - 團隊很在意流程是否順暢，持續思考如何合作會更有效率。我們會捲起袖子，直接去改變困擾我們的事物，優化整個開發跟生活的體驗。
4. 持續成長 - 除了例行性的讀書會，我們會透過團隊內的 Developer Session ，了解不同 domain 的夥伴做過哪些專案；也會邀請團隊外部成員向我們分享其他團隊成功案例或開發過程。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】
· 參與 Dcard 好物研究室產品的開發及優化。
· 參與 Dcard 機器學習相關產品的開發以及優化，可能會碰觸到的東西有 Machine Learning 演算法開發，Data Pipeline 設計，以及 MLOps 等等的東西。
· 和其他專案的開發者合作開發 Dcard 機器學習相關系統建置。
· 快速交付可行性架構跟改進機器學習產品系統相關計畫。
· 協助設計師、前端與後端⼯程師進行介⾯或使用流程的 A/B 測試。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Machine Learning Engineer, E-Commerce 具備以下能力】
· 有一年以上的電商機器學習系統相關工作經驗，熟悉相關應用場景，例如：電商推薦或是電商搜尋。
· 熟悉 python 且不排斥學習新語言（Go, Scala）。
· 能夠寫出可讀性高、可維護、可延伸性的程式以及進行高品質的 code review。
· 熟悉軟體專案開發流程。
· 可以根據定義好的問題設計技術解決方案。
· 對機器學習演算法及工作流程有基礎的認知，例如推薦系統等等。
· 有良好的溝通協作能力，能夠清楚的表達想法，並與其他團隊順利合作。
熱愛思考使⽤者的需求，將演算法動手打造成產品。

【如果你擁有以下能力、經驗與特質，那就更棒了！】
· 熟悉分散式系統設計，處理巨量資料或大型系統開發。
· 熟悉機器學習系統商業應用場景 + 系統設計。
· 能夠解決 TensorFlow / Keras / PyTorch 在巨量資料開發時遇到的問題。
· 熟悉以下其中幾項技術：
   · Elasticsearch
   · Airflow
   · Kubernetes
   · Postgres / BigQuery / Redis
   · Scikit-Learn / XGBoost / PyTorch
   · Linux
   · Spark / Flink

job_name: 資深網頁前端工程師
cust_name: 東森新媒體控股股份有限公司
job_detail:
ETtoday目前Alexa排名為台灣第3名，全球第118名。2020牛津大學全球調查，ETtoday連續三年蟬聯台灣第1名網路新聞媒體。歡迎行動端好手一同加入新媒體，提供用戶最佳的行動端體驗！

工作內容：與 PM/UI/UX、前後端、資料、演算法工程師一同合作，開發東森新媒體旗下新服務。

基本條件：
1. 具有 3 年以上的網頁前端開發經驗
2. 熟悉 HTML/CSS/JavaScript，瞭解ECMAScript 2015+ 特性
3. 曾使用過 TypeScript 與 Vue.js (Vue3) 前端框架開發網站應用程式
4. 瞭解 API 概念，具備 RESTful API 介接經驗尤佳
5. 瞭解 Git 版本控制系統，包含但不限於分支合併、衝突修正

加分條件：
1. 具備與設計師合作經驗，實作網站切版
2. 具備行動網頁開發與除錯流程經驗
3. 曾學習任一後端語言開發經驗 (例如 PHP/Node.js/Golang/Python/Ruby)
4. 暸解網路資訊安全，以 OWASP TOP 10 為主

工程師之路不難走，但希望招募的你：
- 需有無比的熱忱或目的能支撐著你為何走上這工程師之路
- 擁有異於常人的抗壓力，因為主管很喜歡拋問題給你想，期許工程師了解自己寫了啥
- 具獨立開發也具和其他人組隊打怪的能力
- 對於新技術有滿滿的好奇心且願意去研讀，並樂於在吸收消化後分享給團隊成員
specialty: AJAX, HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, VueJS
skill: 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計
