job_name: HR Assistant (Full-Time Contractor)
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Company Overview:
As a global leader in cloud security, Trend Micro develops Internet content security and threat management solutions that make the world safe for businesses and consumers to exchange digital information. With more than 30 years of experience, we’re recognized as the market leader in server security, virtual security, and small business content security. At Trend we look for people who have the passion and energy to challenge old ways of thinking and to be an agent of change. We believe in working hard, thinking smart and having fun in the process.

Key Responsibilities includes:
We are looking for a great team member who is self-directed, passionate in all dimensions of HR affairs, and a team player. You will work closely with internal stakeholders including recruiting team and HR shared service team to deliver quality services and programs in a timely manner. The position will be responsible for HR administrative work and be the supportive role for recruitment and ER. The major tasks include:
• 	
Job Description:
1. Assist recruitment via job posting, interview arrangement, and interview process facilitation.
2. Provide quality logistic support for recruiting projects.
3. HR recruiting database system maintenance
4. ER logistic and programs support
5. HR activities support
6. Ad-hoc assignments handling

The desired candidate’s background and competence: 
• BA or equivalent with an average 1-year of relevant work experience
• Good at MS Office, including Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint
• Be able to deal with multiple tasks and deliver quality results
• Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
• An effective communicator
• Learn and pick up new things fast, can-do attitude
• English proficiency level is above the average
• Having some other specific skills that are likely to bring in differences to the team will be a plus

job_name: 外國（外銷）業務(近捷運，40年歐美外貿)
cust_name: 翔詒實業股份有限公司
job_detail:
基本要求: 
錄取後2~3週能上職
英語證照或能力B1~B2/ 願意出國辦展覽、拜訪客戶、廠商
面試會採遠端和可能的面對面，因為部分面試管理者在海外。
『年後上班』

薪資：職位欄位的薪水範圍是底薪＋維護抽成約表示薪資“可達到”範圍，而不是純底薪。薪資可以是固定薪資或是抽成薪資，歡迎自行評估能力。

對於新進職場新鮮人我們提供參考薪資水準
111人力銀行資料：國貿人員大學畢業-工作 3-5年-平均是$36956，研究所-工作3-5年-平均是$41693。

補助金：我司提拱補助金簽訂最低服務年限者，優先歡迎。

公司網站：https://birdland-asia.webflow.io/

公司董事會今年改組由二代接班，逐步增加與改組公司為適合全面電子化之貿易公司。
需注意，
1. 二代接班期間約兩年，業務此期間還是需要應變管理和溝通方式傳統的老闆合作。
2. 兩方以勞動合同（包含智慧財產保密等）保護雙方，亦優先錄取願意簽最低保証年限者並輔以補助金，補助金只提供簽約會提早三個月提出離職者，如有違約才會收回。
3. 對純貿易商與三角貿易有經驗有興趣。

本公司組織單純並遵照勞基法規定，不追求超時工作，三節獎金，提供下午茶點福利，辦公室地點距捷運忠孝復興站步行約 3分鐘，交通方便，上下班時間正常，歡迎積極進取的相關經驗者，需重視並理解客戶以及供應商的需求。

1. 確認產品規格。
2. 負責向廠商訪價。
3. 負責向客戶報價並確認訂單。
4. 安排生產出貨，處理出貨報關文件作業。
5. 決定貨物裝運之方法，並準備提貨單、發貨單及其他相關文件。
6. 追蹤交期及出貨狀況。
7. 負責客戶與廠商之間的往來溝通與建檔。
8. 依據上級規劃籌備以及參與國際各項相關展覽。
9. 處理顧客及廠商的客訴。

International Sales Specialist is to support export business.

You will have support from our shipping specialist.

Communicate with clients regarding order details and shipment arrangements, and create the necessary paperwork.

Coordination with suppliers for placing orders in the system, logistics assistance, L/C application, and presentation of documents to the bank.

Organise export documentation and track payment via L/C or T/T.

Resolve customer and supplier issues as soon as possible to expedite the shipping.

With a problem-solving mentality, you must be proactive and open to learning. Prioritise customer satisfaction and supplier coordination.


公司待遇優渥, 一年數次佳節獎金, 只要能夠快速學會貿易各項專業能力公司就會再調薪, 當能獨立做好專案經營客戶能力, 年終獎金就會逐步調高.

我司是穩定經營的老字號貿易公司，但年輕一代逐漸接班需要找到人才來共同面對改革與成長, 園藝和打獵的貿易是同時要涉獵產品製造原理/生產架構, 但此領域之客戶也是歐美中高階收入者，你也會有機會享受拜訪客戶時的特別歐美商談經驗。 我們希望找到有企圖心肯努力的人才加入我們的團隊一起前進打拼積累來獲得個人自身努力在各方面的豐收與成長.

除薪資, 勞健保與年終依能力分配獎金, 我們的客戶多為歐美來往數十年之對象, 業務人員可以學會相當多的各種專業技術及知識, 成就自己成為專業國貿人才

7. 其他主管交辦事項。

1. 總務人員事務種類繁多，且偶爾須至楊梅廠區與廠內人員溝通協調，如應徵者欲應徵純行政電腦工作或簡易工作者，請考慮其他職務。
2. 具備乙種職業安全衛生主管者加分。
3. 具備採購相關技能者加分。

job_name: R0004962: Visual Designer (CTOne)
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
We are looking for a talented visual designer to enhance our branding visual identity. As a visual designer, you will work with the product & marketing team to determine design requirements (brand image/ solution/ product/ website/ social media content… ) with eye-catching and professional graphic designs along with our principles of brand guidelines.
To be successful as a visual designer, you should exhibit experience in visual design and the ability to contribute creative expertise to brainstorming sessions. 

Visual Designer Responsibilities:

Developing prototypes to integrate logos and brand images, along with brand guidelines, into related products and platforms, including social media, and website.

Submitting visual design concepts of related documents (SB/DS/Use cases…) & applications (social media/ Physical & Virtual exhibition…) for brainstorming and approval 

Enhancing current digital images/document layout, including the application of contrasts and gradients.

Managing & maintain social media and article publishment.

Consulting with the different stakeholders and determining visual design preferences and expectations.

Collaborating with IT developers/Vendors in aligning visual designs with website functionalities.

Keeping track of advancements in visual design technologies and applications, as well as industry trends.
major: 藝術商業設計 其他藝術相關
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通
other:
Visual Designer Requirements:
1. Bachelor’s or associate degree in graphic design, visual arts, or similar.
2. 2-3 years of experience as a visual designer, or similar.
3. A complete portfolio of visual design examples.
4. Advanced proficiency in visual design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite, InDesign, Photoshop, and Illustrator.
5. Exceptional creative abilities as reflected in original visual designs.
6. Exceptional ability to collaborate on visual design projects and integrate social media and websites.
7. Proficiency in keeping up with visual design technologies and industry trends.
8. Fluent Mandarin and English communication & writing skills are required.

job_name: 【徵才】國立臺灣科技大學產學創新學院人工智慧跨域科技研究所專任教師
cust_name: 國立臺灣科技大學
job_detail:
聘任等級：助理教授以上專任教師
擬聘員額：專任教師1名，起聘日期配合本校聘用流程與相關規定。
所需資格條件：
(一)具國內外資訊、電機、電子等相關領域博士學位者，具備資訊安全專長及其它相關領域。
(二)至起聘日止，依據技術及職業教育法第 25 條，「應具備一年以上與任教領域相關之業界實務工作經驗，但於施行(2015 年 1 月14 日)前已在職之專任合格教師，不在此限。前項與任教領域相關之業界實務工作經驗之認定標準，由中央主管機關定之。」
(三)曾有下列情事之一者，本校不得僱用：
(1)犯性侵害犯罪防治法第二條第一項之性侵害犯罪，經有罪判決確定。
(2)經學校性別平等教育委員會（以下簡稱性平會）或依法組成之相關委員會調查確認有性侵害行為屬實。
(3)經學校性平會或依法組成之相關委員會調查確認有性騷擾或性霸凌行為，有終止契約及終身不得擔任教育從業人員之必要。
(4)經學校性平會或依法組成之相關委員會調查確認有性騷擾或性霸凌行為，有終止契約之必要，且議決一年至四年不得擔任教育從業人員，於該管制期間。
(5)經主管教育行政機關認定符合補習及進修教育法第九條第六項第二款之情事。

cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
‧ 你對機器學習、分散式系統有源源不絕的熱忱嗎?
‧ 你擁有打不死的好奇心，喜歡耐著性子追根究底嗎?
‧ 你擅長靈活思考與行動，不斷探索、驗證與思考如何突破瓶頸?

我們正尋找擁有這樣特質的你……一起扮演現代福爾摩斯，加入趨勢科技Core Tech Holmes Project!

在這個團隊，你可以~
* 悠遊於千萬筆的Real Data中，分析全球網路使用者行為及日新月異的病毒資料
* 從龐雜無盡的資料中找出潛在的抽象規則，依據數據結果設計並建構模型來提供解決方案、預測使用者/病毒行為
* 透過與其他軟體研發人員的合作，參與趨勢核心threat projects, 提升資安相關的技術和問題處理流程，以增加技術的廣度

利用  Machine Learning及Deep Learning ，讓我們一起來訓練智慧的科技腦。透過資料學習，不斷調整模型的構成，抽絲剝繭，從平凡中挖掘黑暗威脅的跡象。讓我們一起來發揮資料的技術力，在巨人的肩膀上發現問題的脈絡，創造AI大未來!

Welcome to join us! Be one of our Holmes!


Seeking for candidate who is able to create scalable solution by applying machine learning techniques for customer-facing problems.

1. Will be dealing with huge amount of data to identify new type of fast-changing internet threat
2. Will closely work with development team to express the novelty ideas and turn it into productive solution to solve the real world case.
3. Will closely communicate with Operation and Field Support to understand customer-facing problems and optimize the machine learning techniques to solve customer’s problem
4. Will research on innovative machine learning technique that could solve real world challenging cases
major: 數學及電算機科學學科類
other:
- Experience with applying predictive modeling using sophisticated algorithms such as Support Vector Machine, Deep Learning… etc. to solve real world case.
- Experience with handling and analysis of large-scale knowledge extraction, pattern recognition, text mining, graph analysis
- Experience with very large dataset collection/processing/analysis under customer’s environment and able to provide predictive capability of potential future threats
- Experience with large scale distributed programming
- Experience with distributed computing platforms

job_name: R0004787 Frontend Developer (Vision One XDR)
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Overview

The XDR capabilities of Trend Micro’s Vision One platform provide context-aware investigation, recording, and reporting of system-level activities. It collects detailed activity data from kernel mode, user mode and/or native system events across multiple security layers, including endpoints, servers, cloud workloads, emails, and networks.

Workbench and OAT, as part of XDR, play as key components to visualize the detections/alerts/impact scope/indicators to solve alert fatigue issues and help security analysts to simplify the flow of investigating incidents and take corresponding mitigation responses quickly.

Check the demo for details of XDR Workbench: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=odGDYzQbe80

[Responsibility]

1. Work closely with stakeholders for requirement discussion, cross-team integration, and troubleshooting.

2. Responsible for delivery of features from planning, design, implementation, testing, deploy and operate.

3. Improve delivery process & quality continuously including automation and working model refinement.

1. Bachelor's degree or above, majored in computer science related.
2. Expert in JavaScript, AJAX, CSS, HTML, frontend system.
3. Familiar with React and development tools.
4. Experienced in writing front-end tests with jest/jasmine or react testing library.

[Personality]
1. Good teamwork and problem-solving skills.
2. Aggressive working attitude.
3. Willing to take on the challenges.
4. Open-minded, love to share.

[Big Plus]
1. Familiar with D3, Pixi, and Typescript will be a big plus.
2. Familiar with modern front-end build pipelines and CI tools.
3. Familiar with version control tools.

6. Understanding of DevOps culture.

8. Good English communication skill.

job_name: R0004964: CT (5G) Threat Researcher
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Description:
Join us and apply your IT / Cloud/Cyberthreat knowledge in CT (Communication Technology) industry.
Today, CT network such as 5G is evolving toward IT / Cloud infrastructure.

The existing IT cyberthreat is also moving to CT network. Our vision is to protect CT network like in IT environment.

Our target markets include:
Private 5G in enterprise or vertical markets such smart factory, smart airport, smart port, smart healthcare etc.

Telco industry is transforming its RAN(Radio Access Network) to be open architecture, ORAN (Open RAN.)

5G Edge AI which is a crucial application for autonomous robots like AMR (Autonomous Mobile Robot.)

Your IT skill set is just right for this journey of CT revolution. In addition, your security knowledge is a plus in this booming market.

Don't worry about lacking CT knowledge, don't worry, we will share, learn, and grow together!

Responsibilities:

- Threat Research with a focus on cellular networks and IoT.
- Run day-to-day signature development operations.
- Publish research papers.
- File CVEs.
- Presentations at security conferences.
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
specialty: Linux, C++, Python, Go, HTTP, TCP/IP
other:
Requirements:

Must have:
- Familiar with Linux.
- Familiar with Networking concepts and protocols (Eg: TCP/IP, HTTP)
- Experience in packet capture (pcap) and analysis. Experience in network tools. (Eg: tcpdump, scapy, nmap, msf)
- Familiar with one of Python/C/C++/Go.

Highly desirable:
- Experience with Bug-bounty-hunting, Pen-testing or red-teaming. (Preferably network related).
- Understanding of mobile network technology (Packet Core, RAN, SIM).
- Experience in AV/IPS rule development.
- Interest in gathering threat data from various sources.

job_name: 永康門市人員
cust_name: 六月初一_八結國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
六月初一是一間伴手禮品牌店
我們的使命－是要成為華人每個重要時刻傳遞心意的代言人。
想和我們一起成為台灣最夯品牌門店的「伴手禮顧問」嗎？

我們正在招募未來的新夥伴，我們需要您具備的能力是：
1.「顧客接待」：希望您充滿活力、熱情的獨特魅力與服務力，讓客人有賓至如歸的感受。
2.「商品銷售」：除了介紹商品外，能夠了解客人的需求，從中推薦最適合對方品項。
3.「櫃台作業」：基本門市作業（包裝、結帳、開立發票、統計銷售、晚班結帳、零用金保管…）
4.「環境維護」：隨時發揮美感，維護門店環境美觀及商品陳列，替品牌形象加分。
5.「預接訂單」：門市提供訂單現場、線上預接服務，需要您來接洽與回應
6.「庫存管理」：定期盤點商品、包材的庫存量，確保貨源充足。
7.「顧客意見回饋」：我們想聽見每一位顧客和夥伴的感受與聲音，需要您在第一線的回饋，讓我們持續精進。

您在這可以獲得
1.「培訓服務」：來到一份新的工作，少數人可以一下子發揮長才獨當一面，而多數人都需要時間的累積，我們有準備完善的培訓系統來協助您快速接軌，您可以放心的成為我們的夥伴。
2.「績效獎金」：具備多元的達標獎金制度，來犒賞為客人盡心服務的各位。

公司的企業文化
1.要擁有卓越、當責且正面的人生態度。
2.在團隊中要營造出同心協力、樂於分享、組織學習的氛圍。
3.要時時保有品牌思維。
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂
skill: 電話接聽與人員接待事項, 賣場／門市營運計畫與管理, 資金管理, 客戶資料更新維護, 客戶情報蒐集, 客訴案件處理, 櫃檯門市接待與需求服務, 櫃台服務與文具伙食供應管理, 產品進銷存統計分析, 產品介紹及解說銷售

job_name: 永康門市人員(長期工讀)
cust_name: 六月初一_八結國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
六月初一是一間伴手禮品牌店
我們的使命－是要成為華人每個重要時刻傳遞心意的代言人。
想和我們一起成為台灣最夯品牌門店的「伴手禮顧問」嗎？

我們正在招募未來的新夥伴，我們需要您具備的能力是：
1.「顧客接待」：希望您充滿活力、熱情的獨特魅力與服務力，讓客人有賓至如歸的感受。
2.「商品銷售」：除了介紹商品外，能夠了解客人的需求，從中推薦最適合對方品項。
3.「櫃台作業」：基本門市作業（包裝、結帳、開立發票、統計銷售、晚班結帳、零用金保管…）
4.「環境維護」：隨時發揮美感，維護門店環境美觀及商品陳列，替品牌形象加分。
5.「預接訂單」：門市提供訂單現場、線上預接服務，需要您來接洽與回應
6.「庫存管理」：定期盤點商品、包材的庫存量，確保貨源充足。
7.「顧客意見回饋」：我們想聽見每一位顧客和夥伴的感受與聲音，需要您在第一線的回饋，讓我們持續精進。

您在這可以獲得
「培訓服務」：來到一份新的工作，少數人可以一下子發揮長才獨當一面，而多數人都需要時間的累積，我們有準備完善的培訓系統來協助您快速接軌，您可以放心的成為我們的夥伴。

公司的企業文化
1.要擁有卓越、當責且正面的人生態度。
2.在團隊中要營造出同心協力、樂於分享、組織學習的氛圍。
3.要時時保有品牌思維。

job_name: R0001577: Windows Agent-side Development Engineer
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
趨勢科技 - 全球雲端資安領航者 / 全亞洲最大軟體公司 / 企業版圖橫跨五大洲 / 趨勢全球研發基地在台灣 
========================================
Overview
Trend Micro Vision One is a purpose-built threat defense platform that provides added value and new benefits beyond XDR (Extended Detection and Response) solutions, allowing customer to see more and respond faster. Vision One providing deep and broad extended detection and response capabilities that collect and automatically correlate data across multiple security layers—email, endpoints, servers, cloud workloads, and networks—Trend Micro Vision One prevents the majority of attacks with automated protection.

The objective of TW Engineering Group 1 is to provide the best endpoint security solution to help customers, from small & medium businesses to vary large enterprises, conquer cybersecurity challenges effectively and efficiently. Every partner within Group 1 will have opportunity to join diverse squad team and demonstrate his/her expertise and enthusiasm to make customer success in their business without cyber threat. Along this journey, we are looking for partners with not only exceptional engineering expertise, but also great curiosity and customer empathy, so we can learn from customer behavior and create business impact together.

Responsibility
1. Co-work with internal/external stakeholder including customer, resellers, technical support, and PM to research, ideate, develop, and operate user-centric product, service, and tools in multiple platform (major in Windows).
2. Design & implement ways to measure and validate the quality of customer experience we deliver
3. Analyze & resolve customer problems by listening to data and customer feedbacks.

Qualification
MUST Have
- Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent working experience
- At least 2+ years of Windows programming experience
Optional/Plus
- Experience in following skill/domain is a plus:
1.Kernel/driver development
2.Client/Server application development
3.Android, Chromebook, macOS, or iOS development.
4.Endpoint threat research
5.InfoSec/SOC job roles working experience
6.Data analytics
7.SaaS/Web service, RESTful interface.
8.Management software

Non-technical Skill and Personality
- Excellent problem-solving, solution-delivering skills, cross-team collaboration/communication, and ability to work independently
- Fast learner and strong passion of learning new technology
- Preference of Autonomy, Growth Mindset, and Situational - -Leadership
- Open attitude to the DevOps on-call rotation culture or flexibility for adjusting working hours

job_name: R0002445:【新鮮人募集！！】Network Software Engineer
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
網路世界無遠弗屆，網路技術的應用當然也是！
趨勢科技Network軟體開發團隊由不同領域的網路技術專家組成，在這個職位，你將透過與團隊互動過程中，提升自己技術的深度與廣度，並能實際感受到自己幫助了客戶解決了痛點與難題！
您將在趨勢科技透過不斷進化的世界級產品，面對業界最具挑戰的技術困境，從解決問題的過程中淬煉出卓越技術。

=======為什麼是Network? ===============
• 在現今Hybrid Cloud的虛實並構環境當中，所有的產品幾乎都離不開Network技術，範疇非常廣泛。
• 各種在Network出現的未知威脅層出不窮，需要不斷提升技術層次，以新概念解決新問題。
• 學習嶄新的Network技術，不論是弱點分析、異常偵測或是開發新的應用型軟體產品，不斷地將新技術應用至產品中。

=======加入我們，你將可以===============
• 解決各種技術難題：以客戶遇到的問題與回饋，快速反應至開發的方向與目標 。#打怪練功
• 世界級的客戶規模：有機會接觸全球前1,000大的企業與政府組織的環境與需求，提升處理進階且複雜網路環境的經驗值。#Level Up++
• 持續開發不斷學習：不論是既有技術(VPN，SSL bumping，SDN)或是新的協定與機制(HTTP/3，eBPF)等等，不斷提升自我能力。#技能樹點好點滿
• 斜槓發展跨域實踐：新技術的實踐者，不論在進行核心引擎設計(core engine design)、新世代網路協定解析、威脅與弱點分析、網路異常偵測等等，網路的世界有無限的可能性。#跨域轉職


趨勢科技提供強大的網路防護功能（雲端網路層IPS防護，Tipping Point Threat Protection系統，Deep Discovery進階威脅防護方案等等)，
加入我們，透過企業級的網路核心引擎及相關技術開發與產品相互整合，一起守護網路世界的資訊安全。
major: 資訊工程相關
specialty: Linux, C, C#, C++, HTTP, TCP/IP
other:
• Passionate for network security! 對網路安全技術充滿熱忱 。
• 對於學習懷抱渴望，能快速學習!持續學習! 
• 喜歡新的挑戰，有企圖心不斷地往下鑽，永遠以最新技術耐心地解決未來可能出現的問題。
• 熟悉以下程式語言：C++/C#, SQL query (擇一)。
• Python/ Powershell, Kernel driver domain knowledge is a plus!

job_name: R0002445: 【新鮮人募集！！】Software Engineer 軟體研發工程師
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
你希望開發出每間企業，每個使用者必備的資安產品嗎?
你期待學得一身技術後，可以帶給使用者更便利的生活，更完整的資安防護嗎?
你想見識一秒鐘幾百萬上下的資料量，並了解資料是如何快速、有效且穩定地被評比及處理？
你會相信在你敲下按鍵的同時，你的解決方案就可以全自動且快速地佈署到世界各地的雲端資料中心嗎？

趨勢科技成立 34 年以來，擁有上百種資安產品，不論是個人與大型企業不可或缺的資安防護，或是抓住目前最新潮流的 5G、IoT、元宇宙 (Web3)，更運用最新雲端運算、Big Data、Networking 等技術守護全世界企業與個人用戶的資訊安全。

我們的產品行銷全球，影響全世界數千萬個用戶，更連續 16 年獲經濟部頒發 20 大「台灣最佳國際品牌」，品牌價值高達 20 億美金。 加入趨勢科技，與我們一同保護全球數千萬的網路使用者的數位安全！

【職務類別】
• 企業網路資安防護：開發企業端的資安防護解決方案，客戶來自世界各地數萬個大型企業用戶，除了需要設計出世界級高效能的資安產品，也需聆聽客戶的需求、提供完整的解決方案，全方位的守護端點裝置、雲端環境的安全。

• 個人家庭資安防護：提供針對一般消費者的資安解決方案，囊括車聯網，5G、PC、 IoT ，VR/AR 、元宇宙 (Web3) 等最新領域。

• 網路資安防護平台：透過偵測與回應來分析高風險但看不見的網路環節，在這裡您會碰到核心引擎設計、新世代網路協定解析 (i.e. HTTP/3)、弱點分析、網路異常偵測或是開發應用型軟體產品，並不斷提升技術層次 (i.e. VPN, SSL bumping, SDN etc.)，以新概念解決新問題。

• 核心技術開發： 在趨勢科技核心技術開發團隊中，你將與資安研究員合作，收集來自世界各地各種型態的資料、找出可能的威脅與攻擊，並將研究出的解決方案廣泛運用在趨勢科技各產品線中。從大數據、雲端到系統底層，透過多元技術的應用讓駭客無所遁形！

• 資安威脅研究：你是深藏不露的白帽駭客，站在正義的一方保護全世界資訊網絡的安全，透過滲透測試、逆向工程等技術與研究魂來找出各種潛藏在我們日常生活，或是未來可能發生的資安危機，如果你對資訊安全充滿興趣，並已透過研究論文或實作來證明自己，相信你會在這個職位上找到樂趣!
 
【教育訓練】
趨勢科技的「3-3-6-6 新鮮人培訓計畫」，提供新世代族群在入職後首 3 個月扎實學習專業技能，並搭配 3 個月的專案實作及各 6 個月的工作訓練與跨團隊溝通，Mentor 手把手教學，帶領新鮮人快速熟悉實務開發流程，累積國際視野，讓每一位具有熱情的台灣軟體人才都能找到屬於自己的國際舞台。

【面試流程】
1. 透過 104 投遞履歷，標註擅長領域及實作專案經驗更能提高您的履歷點閱率！
2. 完成 Codility 線上程式測驗小試身手，通過者進一步邀約面談。
3. 進入後續面談流程，接受白板題的挑戰，show 出最好的自己。
4. 面試結果將依序通知，分發部門將於錄取後至報到前 3 個月，依公司需求及你的個人意願進行媒合。
採先到先審制，越早投遞就可以預先卡位呦！

job_name: R0004525: 【2023 研發替代役】研力覺醒- Software Engineer 軟體工程師
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
研力 (軟體開發能力)是一種潛質 (potential)，我們相信，每位新進工程師身上都有著研力，經過資深絕地武士師徒制 (Company / Leader / Mentor) 的訓練，會更加覺醒 (developed)，在經過一連串試煉後，最終進化成為絕地武士 (competitive software engineer in a global company)!!! 

在趨勢宇宙中，你可以:
	• 見識到一秒鐘幾百萬上下的資料量，並了解如此海量資料是如何快速地、有效地，而且穩定地被評比及處理
	• 憑你一己之力，在彈指須臾之間，就能打造出一整座雲端資料中心
	• 嘗試『一鍵式佈署』，就在你敲下按鍵的同時，你的解決方案就可以全自動地、快速地佈署到全世界所有的雲端資料中心
	• 了解高資訊流量的處理過程中，該如何確保軟體服務的高可用性（High Availability）與高擴展性（High scalability）
	• 清楚如何避免自己所建構的網站被攻破，並了解各種常見的駭客手法以及對應之道

加入趨勢，研力覺醒!!

職務內容：
1. 全程參與專案從規畫、設計開發、測試、佈署到維運
2. 自動化及優化開發及部署流程
3. 熱情學習，每天為變身成為全方位雲端工程師注入養份
major: 資訊工程相關 其他數學及電算機科學相關
other:
資格：
1. 熟悉至少一項程式語言: Java, Python, C++, Go, ...etc
2. 具Linux platform操作基礎
3. 應用過Public Cloud Service(AWS/GCP/Azure)的經驗大大加分

特質：
1. 天然神隊友，看到問題就想解
2. 積極主動
3. 活著就是為了接受挑戰
4. 學得快


*僅限2023應屆畢業之碩士生
*面試流程: 線上Coding 測驗>> 面試>> 於2022/12/12~陸續通知面試結果(配合政府作業流程)

job_name: R0004709: Hybrid Cloud Messaging /AD Sr. Engineer
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
The Role: 
We are seeking candidates who have strong, proven experience as messaging and identity subject matter expert in global matrix style organization, capable of identify issues within the infrastructure, come up with best practices/plan and implement changes to streamline operations and ensure optimization and efficiency across all systems managed by the team and capable of leading other team members for planning and implementation.

The ideal candidate will be proactive, and customer focused, highly focus on automation preferably with previous experience as Architect or Subject Matter Expert for messaging and identify management on premise and cloud.

Your Responsibilities:

Provide senior technical expertise for Messaging and Identity Management Services in a global team.

Designing, implementing and running new infrastructure architecture when required and ensuring that is flexible and support business needs by maintaining an understanding of business strategies and infrastructure capabilities.

Engage with R&D to support internal Beta Program helping to enhance our Products and create Business value.

Strong team player able to lead small team of senior and junior engineers, drive projects and prioritise based on business value, risk management, optimization and efficiency.

Research innovative platforms that will improve availability, performance and efficiency for current services.

Hands-On for Messaging and Identity Infrastructure, including technologies like Messaging Internet Gateway, Exchange 2016, Postfix, MS Office 365, Federation Service, Active Directory, Multifactor Authentication technologies.

Create and implement risk mitigation processes and conduct security audits to determine weaknesses in all applications managed by the team.

Your Profile:

You have a higher education in Computer Science, Engineering or similar

4+ years’ experience as Architect for Identity, Messaging Management Services.

2 years’ experience leading technical projects in a global environment.

You have deep knowledge around Azure AD, Active Directory, Powershell, DNS, SAML-based Authentication, Exchange 2016, Office 365 and Hybrid Configurations, Postfix and Messaging Internet Gateway.

Deep knowledge about DKIM, SPF, DMARC.

Good understanding of Windows and Linux Systems, Virtualization Infrastructure, Storage and Network as well as SaaS Services.

High focus on scripting, automation and DevOps.

You know how to work in an Enterprise IT environment and within a structured project delivery framework.

You are an excellent communicator with the ability to correspond effectively with all levels of Business and IT.

You can thinking globally, acting locally and work in multi-cultural teams around the globe.

You are a problem solver with the ability to effectively prioritize work.
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
specialty: NDS/Novell Directory Services, Microsoft Exchange, DNS

job_name: R0004022: Cloud Solution Architect (Consumer License Platform)
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Overview:

Consumer License Platform, as one of the oldest consumer core services. Not only do we support activation keys per product and per license period, but we are also evolving and supporting increasingly convenient activation and login methods such as OIDC and social login. Here, you can not only get access to core technologies, cross-regional service deployment, but also get a glimpse of the close relationship between business value and the authorization activation process.


Responsibilities:

Identify system integration requirements and work with Trend Micro product teams and / or outside system integrator partners to deliver integration solutions.

Identify improvement opportunities, take actions or work with others to drive changes from time to time.

Contribute to departmental best practices, strategies, methodologies and documentation for increased efficiencies.

Have a strong focus on security and compliance within a cloud environment.

Have a strong focus on metrics, measurement, and reporting on and improving service levels.


Requirements:

7+ years professional experience in software development.

AWS/Azure Hands on experience of infrastructure, systems and application architecture in large scale, web-based applications.

Experience with container solutions (Docker, K8s, EKS) and serverless cloud architecture.

Experience with RDBMS system and NoSQL solution.

Experience with DevOps and Agile.

Ability to present and communicate complex technical concepts or explain business backgrounds clearly.

Good English communication skills.


Plus:

Familiar with various Hybrid cloud monitoring tools, performance monitoring and profiling tools.

Experience with Windows IIS web server operations.

One or more of below certifications or training is desired:

AWS Certified Solutions Architect

Microsoft Azure Administrator

Certified Kubernetes Administrator

Linux/Solaris/UNIX System Administration

job_name: R0002445:【新鮮人募集！！】Windows Developer for Customer Success
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
想要加入專門解決跨國問題的團隊嗎？
想要成為解決難題的軟體工程師進而影響全世界嗎？
想要讓你的使用者遍及世界各地嗎？
Join the Apex family for better enterprise solutions!!

======== 我們是誰!? ===============
Apex One 是趨勢科技企業端的資安防護解決方案，客戶來自世界各地數萬個大型企業用戶。為了提供全方位的端點保護並帶給客戶完整的使用者體驗，以下任務是我們的重要目標：
➤ 從最基本的驗證產品功能性，到優化產品的效能與穩定性，進而提升使用者體驗。
➤ 聆聽世界各地客戶的需求，提供完整的解決方案，化解世界級的問題。
➤ 建立監測資料看板，觀察並分析潛在問題，在客戶發現之前，完美解決。

======= 這個職位的願景! We wish you can ===============
這個職位是介於軟體開發與產品維運間，建立使用者與開發者的溝通橋樑。
工作中要挑戰的客戶問題與技術可以帶來快速的成長；解決客戶的問題、為提供客戶更好的服務、以及短期與中期帶來商業價值的貢獻，是我們對您的期待。

在這邊，你有機會可以...

➤ [開發/優化] 開發多樣化的工具 (automation / backend tools) 或是改善現有流程去滿足客戶的需求，確保客戶體驗。
➤ [討論/分析] 與客戶溝通及討論及收集資料 (telemetry data)。
➤ [分析/研究] 收集大量的資料，並且監測其效能，確保問題立即被發現且解決。
➤ [開發/研究/回饋] 根據客戶的回饋，提供開發的設計及建議。
➤ [職涯發展] 從客戶的角度出發，依照你的興趣與努力邁向多元的發展可能性，無論是產品設計，資料分析，甚至管理技能，未來的可能性由你自己決定！

======= Skill Requirement===============
➤ Familiar with Windows Programing (IPC/Multi-threading) and network knowledge (HTTP/SMTP/FTP)
➤ Familiar to Programing language, C++/C#, SQL query.
➤ Strong debugging knowledge and tool usage. (dump analysis/WPR/Pcap)
➤ Proactive and fast learner, Team player, good communication skills
➤ Python/ Powershell, Kernel driver domain knowledge is a plus

======= 職位限定小確幸 ============
➤ 夜貓子限定！！為服務中東及全亞洲的企業客戶，本職位需配合客戶時區調整工作時間至：14:00-23:00，您不需要在交通尖峰時段人擠人，可以睡到自然醒吃過早午餐後再優閒上班，除本薪外，輪值當月還可享有每月NT$10,000加碼津貼 (宵夜訂起來！)。
➤ 與世界各地技術人才交流！服務世界級的企業客戶，也需要跟世界級的技術人才合作，才能達成完美客戶體驗！
major: 數學及電算機科學學科類
other:
➤ Familiar with Windows Programing (IPC/Multi-threading) and network knowledge (HTTP/SMTP/FTP)
➤ Familiar to Programing language, C++/C#, SQL query.
➤ Strong debugging knowledge and tool usage. (dump analysis/WPR/Pcap)
➤ Proactive and fast learner, Team player, good communication skills
➤ Python/ Powershell, Kernel driver domain knowledge is a plus

job_name: R0003206: Sr. Ethical Hacker (RDSec)
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
RDSec is a global team dedicating to elimination of software vulnerabilities, improvement of operational security, security of development pipelines, protection of data asset and intellectual property, and promotion of security awareness in Trend Micro.

Responsibilities: 

* perform penetration test on products, services, infrastructure and operation

* create report from test findings, including security issues and risk assessment

* conduct vulnerability root cause analysis and design rectifications

* working with R&D to develop security testing methods, tools and processes

Required skills and experience:

* at least 3 years of pen-testing experience with proven record

* solid knowledge of networks and infrastructure

* solid knowledge of operating systems such as Windows, Linux and Mac

* ability to code in Python, Perl, PowerShell and Bash

* ability to write PoC code and exploits

* good knowledge about common pen-testing tools with use experience

* familiar with MITRE Att&ck framework, OWASP Top 10 and CVSS scoring

* familiar with SAST, DAST, and IAST methodology

* experience of software developer is preferable

* certificate of CEH/OSCP/OSCE/GPEN/GWAPT is a plus

* good communication in English

job_name: R0000002: DevOps Engineer
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
DevOps是一個多元專業的角色，能夠充分使用三把刀進行戰鬥，也就是包含研發、測試、維運
展現三刀流的戰力，替整個開發團隊打通任督二脈，化繁為簡，以簡馭繁，強化開發團隊的設計遠見、促進軟體系統運作效率。

[Job Content]  
DevOps is a kind of architect who can oversee the large scale cloud infrastructure. You will join design discussion with R&D teams about Cloud services and fully utilize the advantage of infrastructure to maintain the service availability. Regarding a large scale cloud design, your opinion is crucial that ensure the infrastructure is scalable, maintainable and measurable.
                                                          
1. Manage service availability and scalability through better monitoring, processes, and infrastructure.
2. Collect infrastructure and application metrics to solve problem 10x faster and improve application performance. 
3. Develop tools and automation to minimize delivery time and increase developer productivity. 
4. Advise in the design and development of evolving services, architecture, and performance standards.
5. For delivering solution, to design, implement, and operate the backend infrastructure and in-the-cloud service which are about large, fast, and robust.
6. Analyze web threat & prototype the solution.

[Challenge/Achievement/Growth] 
● 在趨勢科技，DevOps能隨時掌握世界技術的最新動態!
不管是否曾經聽過、看過，DevOps透過虛擬團隊的會議討論這些最新、最流行的技術應用，找尋未來應用的可能性！
● 在趨勢科技，DevOps能累積各種專業領域的技術與經驗！
不論是系統開發，自動化部署流程建置、監控系統維運或是雲端服務和資料庫的技術，DevOps都可藉由不同專案的歷練，習得十八般武藝，進而奠定成為 Cloud System Engineer、Site Reliability Engineer、Solution Architect、Security Solution Architect的基石，發揮在各式環境中對於資訊安全的敏感度和預防潛在威脅的技術力。

[Related Team/Project/Product]

● Core Tech teams (Web Reputation Service (WRS), Email Reputation Service (ERS), File Reputation Service (FRS))
● Consumer Web Engineering Service team (WSE)
● Consumer Home Network Security (Diamond)
● Consumer Cloud VPN Platform (Yamato)
● Consumer IoT Security (Atom)
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
[Job Skills]

Desired
1. You are very comfortable working on the Linux command line, and have broad knowledge of the surrounding technologies 
2. You are passionate about web and Open Source technology, and you strive to use up-to-date tools and techniques
3. You have practical knowledge of shell and one more scripting language (Python, Perl or Ruby) and of object-oriented programming (C/C++ or Java)

Preferred
1. Experience with LAMP stacks
2. Experience with system automation tools (Puppet, Chef, Ansible, etc.)
3. Experience with monitoring, alerting, and pipeline analysis tools (Nagios, Graphite, Logstash, etc.)
4. Experience with IaaS and Container solution (AWS, VMware, Docker, etc.)
5. Experience with SQL/NoSQL systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Cassandra, MongoDB, Redis, etc.)
6. Experience with problem analysis and solution developing (Mathematics, statistics, machine learning)
7. Knowledge on networking and protocols
8. Knowledge on web threat


[Ideal Candidate] 
●  熱愛，隨時準備好面對變化多端的技術問題
●  喜歡主動溝通，不斷摸索新技術與嘗試新方法，找出問題的原因與正解
●  喜歡分享技術，從sharing & learning 的loop中建構出DevOps的專業能量
●  抱持白帽駭客的精神，以防禦的目的瞭解駭客行為，並進行漏洞修正及威脅防範

job_name: R0000003: Networking Engineer
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
趨勢科技產品的網路架構及設計相對錯綜複雜且極具挑戰性，我們面對超過20M的使用者，在設計前期就慎重考量網路架構的彈性，不斷調整系統效率，以提供最佳網路效能為目標，讓產品功能在順暢的網路環境中發揮到極致。
我們樂於接受這個挑戰，更享受克服挑戰的成就感！你還在等什麼?

[Job Content]

Trend Micro Network Software Engineers hold their professions on network engine, network structures and application of product development and on network security appliance. To build up a big architect of scalable software system or engine, we show our solid programming skills and substantial experience of architecting and implementing systems for high performance and scalability. Moreover, we will involve in the design and implement IoT security in different platforms, e.g. server, mobile and embedded devices, and integrate with cloud services and hardware for smart network applications. For some projects, this role is responsible for evaluating the quality of Trend Micro behavior monitoring the network inspection engines, which are used by more than 20M users in the world. To better handle the professional job, experience with high performance network flow processing, network protocols analysis, cryptography, and cyber security are also advantages for the job domain.

● 透過網路入侵偵測(Network intrusion detection), Bug fixing及Performance tuning技術達到系統軟體效能最佳化
● 透過逆向工程，弱點分析(分析網路封包和網路行為)及malware analysis，設計搜尋引擎及設定規則，開發軟體產品，並和資安專業高手合作，發覺未知的威脅，共同打擊惡勢力

[Challenges/Achievements/ Growth Path]

● Network的技術範疇非常廣泛，網路環境中未知的技術挑戰及威脅層出不窮，需要不斷突破與因應，不斷提升技術層次 (i.e. VPN，SSL bump)，以新概念解決新問題、以深厚的經驗解決深奧的難題。在趨勢科技，你有機會面對別人遇不到的技術困境，從解決問題的過程中淬煉出卓越技術。 
● 我們是新網路技術的實踐者，不論在進行核心引擎設計(core engine design)、弱點分析(vulnerability research)或是開發應用型軟體產品，不斷地將新技術應用至新問題或產品中。 
● 透過產品和技術整合經驗，在不同的整合環境下，提升處理複雜網路環境的經驗值；同時，與Project Manager和Product Manager密切合作溝通過程中，也創造了跨界發展的可能性。
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
[Related Team/Project/Product]

●Network Threat Defense Technology Group teams (Network Security Appliance, Deep Packet Inspection (DPI) Signature, Smart Home Network)
● Consumer team (Home Network/IoT Security team, Web Service Engineering team)

[Job Skills]

Desired
1. Solid C/C++ programming and debugging skill
2. Windows or Linux system development experience or embedded software development experience
3. Strong knowledge of networking protocols especially in TCP/IP, HTTP, and HTTPS
4. Experience with high performance network flow processing, network protocols analysis, cryptography, and cyber security.

Preferred
1. Analyze system performance and scalability characteristics to identify bottlenecks and improve performance
2. Analyze and research emerging threats and develop corresponding solutions
3. Solid technology in windows system/network/driver domain

[Ideal Candidate]

● Passion for network security! 對網路安全技術充滿熱忱
● 對於學習懷抱渴望，能快速學習!持續學習!
● 喜歡新的挑戰，有企圖心不斷地往下鑽，永遠以最新技術耐心地解決未來可能出現的問題
● 良好的溝通協調力 – 在大型軟體開發架構專案中，展現最佳team work spirit

job_name: R0002772: Subject Matter Expert
cust_name: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
[Overview]

5G connectivity introduces advanced IoT applications and contributes to accelerating digital transformation in each industry.  Securing 5G/IoT network becomes crucial for enterprise companies to operate mission-critical systems and achieve sustainable business growth. Trend Micro has just started offering cybersecurity solutions for IT and CT network based on private 5G/IoT technologies. We are now introducing the solutions to target markets and developing eco-system partners to deliver the solutions to enterprise customers in the world.  We need a Subject Matter Expert (SME) who can work together with Global Business Development team to find more partners, telecom operators and end-users so we can introduce Trend Micro product solution & capabilities.


[Responsibilities]

- Work as a collaborative member within global business development team to actively identify and source more partners and customers.

- Participate in the presentation of technical and functional materials of latest products and features.

To fulfill the role of Subject Matter Expert (SME) we are looking for a candidate that matches the following profile:


Technical:

1. Proven experience in IT data network or CT telecom network industries

2. Understand cellular mobile network (3G/4G/5G) relevant knowledge, especially in private 5G network

3. Proven experience in key verticals such as smart factory, smart retailer and smart cities, especially using private 5G network


Non-Technical:

1. Fluent in English reading/writing/listening/speaking. (Chinese/Japanese is the plus)

2. Develop clear, simple, and persuasive communications to influence executive stakeholders

3. Exceptional communication and presentation skills with emotional intelligence to influence key decisions, mediate conflicts and build consensus

4. Self-motivated and creative; having the natural drive to learn and pick up new challenges

5. Experience working with telecom operators and understand telco’s ecosystem.

6. Be able to travel around the world according to the requirement of projects (Mandatory)
